# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-104">Définitions d’entités des types d’informations sensibles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-105">La protection contre la perte de données (DLP) dans le centre de conformité comprend de nombreux types d’informations sensibles que vous pouvez utiliser dans vos stratégies DLP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="91b31-106">Cette rubrique répertorie tous ces types d'informations sensibles et indique ce qu'une stratégie DLP recherche pour chaque type.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="91b31-107">Un type d'informations sensibles est défini par un modèle qui peut être identifié par une fonction ou une expression régulière.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="91b31-108">En outre, des preuves corroborantes comme les mots clés et les sommes de contrôle peuvent être utilisées pour identifier un type d'informations sensibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="91b31-109">La proximité et le niveau de confiance sont également utilisés dans le processus d'évaluation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-110">Les types d’informations sensibles nécessitent l’un de ces abonnements :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-113">Numéro d’acheminement ABA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-113">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-114">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-115">neuf chiffres pouvant être mis en forme ou non mis en forme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-115">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-116">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-117">Avec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-117">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-118">quatre chiffres commençant par 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 ou 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-118">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-119">un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-119">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-120">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-120">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-121">un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-121">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-122">un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-122">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-123">Non mis en forme : neuf chiffres consécutifs commençant par 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 ou 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-123">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-124">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-125">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-126">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-127">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-128">La fonction Func_aba_routing trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-128">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-129">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_ABA_Routing est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-129">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-149">Numéro d’identité nationale (DNI) Argentine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-149">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-150">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-151">Huit chiffres séparés par des points</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-151">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-152">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-153">Huit chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-153">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-154">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-155">un point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-155">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-156">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-157">un point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-157">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-158">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-158">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-159">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-160">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-161">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-162">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-163">L’expression régulière Regex_argentina_national_id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-163">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-164">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_argentina_national_id est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-164">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-176">Numéro de compte bancaire australien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-176">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-177">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-178">six à dix chiffres avec ou sans numéro de succursale d’état bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-178">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-179">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-180">Le numéro de compte est compris entre six et dix chiffres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-180">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-181">Numéro de succursale bancaire en Australie :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-181">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-182">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-183">un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-183">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-184">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-184">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-185">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-186">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-186">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-187">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-188">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-189">L’expression régulière Regex_australia_bank_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-189">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-190">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_australia_bank_account_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-190">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-191">L’expression régulière Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-191">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-192">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-193">L’expression régulière Regex_australia_bank_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-194">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_australia_bank_account_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-212">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-212">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-215">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-215">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-216">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-216">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-217">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-218">11 chiffres avec des délimiteurs facultatifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-218">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-219">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-219">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-220">11 chiffres avec des délimiteurs facultatifs :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-220">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-221">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-221">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-222">un trait d’Union ou un espace conditionnel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-222">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-223">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-223">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-224">un trait d’Union ou un espace conditionnel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-224">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-225">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-225">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-226">un trait d’Union ou un espace conditionnel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-226">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-227">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-227">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-228">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-229">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-229">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-230">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-231">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-231">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-232">La fonction Func_australian_business_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-232">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-233">Un mot clé depuis Keywords_australian_business_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-233">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-234">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-234">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-235">La fonction Func_australian_business_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-235">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-245">Numéro de société Australie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-245">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-246">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-246">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-247">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-247">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-248">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-248">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-249">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-249">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-250">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-250">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-251">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-251">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-252">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-253">neuf chiffres avec des délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-253">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-254">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-255">neuf chiffres avec des délimiteurs :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-255">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-256">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-256">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-257">un espace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-257">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-258">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-258">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-259">un espace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-259">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-260">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-260">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-261">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-262">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-263">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-264">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-265">La fonction Func_Australian_Company_Number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-265">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-266">Un mot clé depuis Keyword_Australian_Company_Number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-266">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-267">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-267">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-268">La fonction Func_Australian_Company_Number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-268">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-278">Numéro de permis de conduire Australie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-278">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-279">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-280">neuf lettres et chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-280">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-281">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-282">neuf lettres et chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-282">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-283">deux chiffres ou lettres (ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-283">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-284">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-284">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-285">cinq chiffres ou lettres (ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-285">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-286">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-286">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-287">une à deux lettres facultatives (ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-287">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-288">quatre à neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-288">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-289">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-289">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-290">neuf chiffres ou lettres (ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-290">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-291">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-292">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-293">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-294">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-295">L’expression régulière Regex_australia_drivers_license_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-295">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-296">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-296">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-297">Aucun mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions n’est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-297">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-397">Numéro de compte médical Australie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-397">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-398">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-399">10 à 11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-399">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-400">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-401">10 à 11 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-401">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-402">le premier chiffre se trouve dans la plage 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-402">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-403">neuvième chiffre est un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-403">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-404">le dixième chiffre est le chiffre de l’émission</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-404">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-405">le onzième chiffre (facultatif) est le numéro individuel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-405">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-406">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-407">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-407">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-408">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-409">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-409">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-410">La fonction Func_australian_medical_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-410">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-411">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-411">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-412">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-412">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-417">compte de prêts immobiliers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-417">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-418">paiements bancaires</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-418">bank payments</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-424">Numéro de passeport Australie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-424">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-425">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-426">Une lettre suivie de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-426">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-427">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-428">Une lettre (ne respectant pas la casse) suivie de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-428">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-429">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-430">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-431">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-432">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-432">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-433">L’expression régulière Regex_australia_passport_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-433">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-434">Un mot clé depuis Keyword_passport ou Keyword_australia_passport_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-434">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-468">Numéro de fichier fiscal Australie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-468">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-469">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-470">huit à neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-470">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-471">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-472">huit à neuf chiffres généralement présentés par des espaces, comme suit :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-472">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-473">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-473">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-474">un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-474">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-475">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-475">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-476">un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-476">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-477">deux à trois chiffres où le dernier chiffre est un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-477">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-478">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-479">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-479">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-480">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-481">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-481">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-482">La fonction Func_australian_tax_file_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-482">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-483">Aucun mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number ou Keyword_number_exclusions n’est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-483">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-484">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-484">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-496">Numéro de permis de conduire autrichien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-496">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-497">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-497">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-498">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-498">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-499">huit chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-499">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-500">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-500">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-501">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-501">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-502">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-503">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-503">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-504">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-505">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-505">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-506">L’expression régulière  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-506">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-507">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-507">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-524">Carte d’identité Autriche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-524">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-525">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-525">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-526">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-526">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-527">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-527">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-528">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-528">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-529">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-529">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-530">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-530">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-531">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-531">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-532">Combinaison de 24 caractères de lettres, de chiffres et de caractères spéciaux</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-532">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-533">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-533">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-534">24 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-534">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="91b31-535">22 lettres (ne respectent pas la casse), chiffres, barres obliques inverses, barres obliques ou signes plus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-535">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-536">deux lettres (ne respectent pas la casse), des chiffres, des barres obliques inverses, des barres obliques, des signes plus ou des signes égal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-536">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-537">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-537">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-538">Non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-538">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-539">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-539">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-540">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-540">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-541">L’expression régulière  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-541">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-542">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-542">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

id national</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-546">national id</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-548">Numéro de passeport autrichien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-548">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-549">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type sensitiveinformation de numéro de passeport UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-549">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-550">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-551">Une lettre suivie d’un espace facultatif et de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-551">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-552">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-552">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-553">Une combinaison d’une lettre, de sept chiffres et d’un espace :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-553">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-554">une lettre (ne respecte pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-554">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-555">un espace (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-555">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-556">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-556">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-557">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-557">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-558">non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-558">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-559">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-560">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-560">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-561">L’expression régulière  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-561">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-562">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-562">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-583">Numéro de sécurité sociale autrichien ou identification équivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-583">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-584">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’information de numéro de sécurité sociale ou d’ID équivalent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-584">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-585">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-585">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-586">10 chiffres au format spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-586">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-587">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-587">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-588">10 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-588">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-589">trois chiffres correspondant à un numéro de série</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-589">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-590">un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-590">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-591">six chiffres correspondant à la date de naissance (JJMMAA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-591">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-592">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-592">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-593">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-593">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-594">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-594">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-595">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-595">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-596">La fonction’Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-596">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-597">_or_equivalent’trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-597">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-598">un mot clé from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-598">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-599">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-599">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-600">La fonction  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-600">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-616">Numéro d’identification fiscale autrichienne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-616">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-617">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-617">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-618">neuf chiffres avec un trait d’union conditionnel et une barre oblique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-618">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-619">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-619">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-620">neuf chiffres avec un trait d’Union et une barre oblique facultatifs :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-620">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-621">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-621">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-622">un trait d’Union (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-622">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-623">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-623">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-624">une barre oblique (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-624">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-625">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-625">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-626">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-627">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-627">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-628">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-629">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-629">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-630">La fonction  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-630">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-631">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-631">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-632">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-632">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-633">La fonction  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-633">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-656">Taxe sur la valeur ajoutée autrichienne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-656">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-657">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-657">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-658">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-658">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-659">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-659">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-660">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-660">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-661">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-661">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-662">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-662">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-663">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-664">modèle alphanumérique de 11 caractères</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-664">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-665">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-665">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-666">modèle alphanumérique de 11 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-666">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-667">A ou a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-667">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-668">T ou t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-668">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-669">Espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-669">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-670">U ou u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-670">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-671">espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-671">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-672">deux ou trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-672">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-673">espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-673">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-674">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-674">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-675">espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-675">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-676">un ou deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-676">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-677">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-677">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-678">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-678">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-679">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-679">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-680">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-680">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-681">La fonction Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-681">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-682">Un mot clé depuis Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-682">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-683">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-683">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-684">La fonction Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-684">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-702">Clé d’authentification Azure DocumentDB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-702">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-703">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-703">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-704">La chaîne « DocumentDb » suivie des caractères et des chaînes présentés dans le modèle ci-dessous.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-704">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-705">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-705">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-706">La chaîne « DocumentDb »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-706">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-707">N’importe quelle combinaison entre 3-200 majuscules ou minuscules, des chiffres, des symboles, des caractères spéciaux ou des espaces</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-707">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-708">Symbole supérieur à (>), signe égal (=), guillemet (") ou apostrophe (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-708">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-709">Toute combinaison de 86 lettres majuscules ou minuscules, des chiffres, une barre oblique (/) ou un signe plus (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-709">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-710">Deux signes égal (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-710">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-711">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-711">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-712">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-712">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-713">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-713">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-714">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-714">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-715">L’expression régulière CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-715">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-716">L’expression régulière CEP_CommonExampleKeywords ne trouve **pas** le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-716">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-745">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="91b31-746">NET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-746">net"</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-939">zéro à deux espaces</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-939">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-940">signe égal (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-940">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-941">zéro à deux espaces</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-941">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-942">toute combinaison de 86 caractères majuscules ou minuscules, des chiffres, une barre oblique (/) ou un signe plus (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-942">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-943">deux signes égal (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-943">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-944">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-947">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-947">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-948">L’expression régulière CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-948">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-949">L’expression régulière CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter ne trouve **pas** le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-949">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-950">L’expression régulière CEP_CommonExampleKeywords ne trouve **pas** le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-950">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-968">Clé de compte de stockage Azure (Générique)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-968">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-969">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-970">Toute combinaison de 86 lettres majuscules ou minuscules, des chiffres, la barre oblique (/) ou le signe plus (+), précédée ou suivie des caractères décrits dans le modèle ci-dessous.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-970">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-971">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-971">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-972">zéro à l’un des symboles supérieur à (>), apostrophe ('), signe égal (=), guillemet (") ou numérique (#)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-972">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-973">toute combinaison de 86 caractères majuscules ou minuscules, des chiffres, la barre oblique (/) ou le signe plus (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-973">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-974">deux signes égal (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-974">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-975">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-976">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-976">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-977">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-978">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-978">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-979">L’expression régulière CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-979">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-980">Numéro de permis de conduire belge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-980">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

```xml

        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1013">Numéro national belge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1013">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1014">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1014">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1015">11 chiffres plus des délimiteurs facultatifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1015">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1016">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1016">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1017">11 chiffres plus des délimiteurs :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1017">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1018">six chiffres et deux points facultatifs au format YY. M. DD pour la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1018">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1019">Délimiteur facultatif : point, tiret, espace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1019">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1020">trois chiffres séquentiels (impairs pour les hommes, pairs pour les femelles)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1020">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1021">Délimiteur facultatif : point, tiret, espace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1021">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1022">deux chiffres de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1022">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1023">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1023">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1024">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1024">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1025">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1025">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1026">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1026">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1027">La fonction Func_belgium_national_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1027">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1028">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_belgium_national_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1028">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1029">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1029">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1030">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1030">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1031">La fonction Func_belgium_national_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1031">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1032">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1032">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
