## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1091">Numéro de passeport belge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1091">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1092">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1092">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1093">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1093">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1094">deux lettres suivies de six chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1094">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1095">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1095">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1096">deux lettres et suivies de six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1096">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1097">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1098">non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1098">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1099">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1100">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1100">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1101">L’expression régulière  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1101">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1102">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1102">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1126">Numéro de sécurité sociale belge ou identification équivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1126">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1127">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’information de numéro de sécurité sociale ou d’ID équivalent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1127">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1128">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1128">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1129">11 chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1129">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1130">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1130">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1131">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1131">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1132">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1132">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1133">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1133">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1134">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1134">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1135">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1135">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1136">La fonction  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1136">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1137">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1137">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1138">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1138">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1139">La fonction  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1139">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1159">Valeur belge-valeur ajoutée de la taxe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1159">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1160">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1160">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1161">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1161">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1162">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1162">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1163">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1163">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1164">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1164">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1165">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1165">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1166">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1167">modèle alphanumérique de 12 caractères</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1167">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1168">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1169">modèle alphanumérique de 12 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1169">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1170">une lettre B ou b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1170">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1171">lettre E ou e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1171">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1172">un chiffre 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1172">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1173">un chiffre compris entre 1 et 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1173">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1174">un point ou un tiret ou un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1174">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1175">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1175">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1176">un point ou un tiret ou un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1176">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1177">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1177">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1178">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1178">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1179">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1179">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1180">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1180">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1181">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1181">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1182">La fonction Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1182">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1183">Un mot clé depuis Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1183">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1184">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1184">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1185">La fonction Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1185">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1197">Numéro CPF Brésil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1197">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1198">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1198">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1199">11 chiffres qui incluent un chiffre de contrôle et peuvent ou non être mis en forme </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1199">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1200">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1200">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1201">Avec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1201">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1202">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1202">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1203">un point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1203">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1204">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1204">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1205">un point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1205">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1206">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1206">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1207">un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1207">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1208">deux chiffres qui sont des chiffres de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1208">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1209">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1209">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1210">11 chiffres où les deux derniers sont des chiffres de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1210">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1211">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1212">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1213">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1214">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1214">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1215">La fonction Func_brazil_cpf trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1215">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1216">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_brazil_cpf est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1216">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1217">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1218">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1219">La fonction Func_brazil_cpf trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1219">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1220">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1232">Numéro d’entité juridique Brésil (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1232">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1233">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1234">14 chiffres qui incluent un numéro d’enregistrement, un numéro de succursale et des chiffres de contrôle, avec des délimiteurs en plus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1234">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1235">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1236">14 chiffres plus des délimiteurs :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1236">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1237">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1237">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1238">un point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1238">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1239">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1239">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1240">un point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1240">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1241">trois chiffres (ces huit premiers chiffres correspondent au numéro d’enregistrement)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1241">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1242">une barre oblique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1242">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1243">Numéro de succursale à quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1243">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1244">un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1244">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1245">deux chiffres qui sont des chiffres de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1245">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1246">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1247">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1247">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1248">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1249">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1249">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1250">La fonction Func_brazil_cnpj trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1250">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1251">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_brazil_cnpj est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1251">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1252">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1253">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1253">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1254">La fonction Func_brazil_cnpj trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1254">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1255">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1277">Carte d’identification nationale (RG) du Brésil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1277">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1278">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1278">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1279">Registro Geral (ancien format) : neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1279">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1280">Registro de identidade (RIC) (nouveau format) : 11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1280">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1281">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1282">Registro Geral (ancien format) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1282">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1283">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1283">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1284">un point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1284">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1285">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1285">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1286">un point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1286">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1287">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1287">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1288">un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1288">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1289">un chiffre qui est un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1289">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1290">Registro de identidade (RIC) (nouveau format) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1290">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1291">dix chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1291">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1292">un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1292">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1293">un chiffre qui est un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1293">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1294">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1294">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1295">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1295">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1296">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1296">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1297">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1297">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1298">La fonction Func_brazil_rg trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1298">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1299">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_brazil_rg est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1299">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1300">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1300">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1301">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1301">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1302">La fonction Func_brazil_rg trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1302">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1303">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1303">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1314">Numéro de permis de conduire de la Bulgarie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1314">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1315">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1315">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1316">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1316">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1317">neuf chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1317">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1318">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1318">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1319">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1319">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1320">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1321">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1321">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1322">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1323">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1323">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1324">L’expression régulière  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1324">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1325">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1325">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1327">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver’s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1327">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1344">Numéro civil uniforme de la Bulgarie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1344">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1345">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1345">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1346">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1346">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1347">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1347">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1348">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1348">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1349">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1349">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1350">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1350">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1351">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1351">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1352">dix chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1352">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1353">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1353">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1354">dix chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1354">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1355">six chiffres correspondant à la date de naissance (AAMMJJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1355">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1356">deux chiffres correspondant à l’ordre de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1356">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1357">un chiffre correspondant au sexe : un chiffre pair pour le mâle et un chiffre impair pour femelle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1357">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1358">un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1358">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1359">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1360">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1360">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1361">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1362">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1362">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1363">La fonction  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1363">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1364">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1364">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1365">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1366">La fonction  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1366">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1411">Numéro de passeport pour la Bulgarie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1411">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1412">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1412">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1413">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1414">neuf chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1414">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1415">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1416">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1416">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1417">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1418">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1418">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1419">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1420">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1420">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1421">L’expression régulière  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1421">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1422">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` ou `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1422">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common`is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1439">Numéro de compte bancaire canadien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1439">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1440">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1441">sept ou douze chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1441">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1442">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1443">Un numéro de compte bancaire au Canada est composé de sept ou douze chiffres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1443">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1444">Un numéro de transit de compte bancaire du Canada est indiqué au format suivant :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1444">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1445">cinq chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1445">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1446">un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1446">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1447">trois chiffres ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1447">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1448">zéro « 0 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1448">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1449">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1449">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1450">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1451">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1451">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1452">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1453">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1453">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1454">L’expression régulière Regex_canada_bank_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1454">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1455">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_canada_bank_account_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1455">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1456">L’expression régulière Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1456">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1457">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1457">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1458">L’expression régulière Regex_canada_bank_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1458">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1459">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_canada_bank_account_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1459">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1483">Numéro de permis de conduire Canada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1483">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1484">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1485">Varie selon la province</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1485">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1486">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1487">Plusieurs modèles pour les différentes provinces : Alberta, Colombie-Britannique, Manitoba, Nouveau-Brunswick, Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador, Nouvelle-Écosse, Ontario, Île-du-Prince-Édouard, Québec et Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1487">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1488">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1489">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1489">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1490">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1491">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1491">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1492">La fonction Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1492">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1493">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1493">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1494">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_canada_drivers_license est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1494">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />

      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />

      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />

      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />

      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1630">Numéro de service d’intégrité Canada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1630">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1631">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1631">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1632">dix chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1632">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1633">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1633">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1634">dix chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1634">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1635">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1635">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1636">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1636">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1637">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1637">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1638">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1638">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1639">L’expression régulière Regex_canada_health_service_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1639">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1640">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_canada_health_service_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1640">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1641">Mots clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1641">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1642">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1642">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1643">numéro d’assurance-maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1643">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1644">informations sur le patient</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1644">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1645">services de santé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1645">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1646">services spécialisés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1646">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1647">accident automobile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1647">automobile accident</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1652">Numéro de Passeport Canada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1652">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1653">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1654">deux lettres majuscules suivies de six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1654">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1655">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1656">deux lettres majuscules suivies de six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1656">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1657">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1658">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1658">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1659">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1660">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1660">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1661">L’expression régulière Regex_canada_passport_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1661">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1662">Un mot clé depuis Keyword_canada_passport_number ou Keyword_passport est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1662">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1692">Numéro d’identification médicale personnelle (PHIN) Canada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1692">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1693">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1694">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1694">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1695">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1696">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1696">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1697">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1698">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1698">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1699">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1700">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1701">L’expression régulière Regex_canada_phin trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1701">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1702">Au moins deux mots clés provenant d’Keyword_canada_phin ou de Keyword_canada_provinces sont trouvés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1702">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1735">Numéro d’assurance sociale Canada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1735">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1736">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1737">neuf chiffres avec des traits d’Union ou des espaces facultatifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1737">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1738">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1739">Avec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1739">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1740">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1740">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1741">un trait d’Union ou un espace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1741">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1742">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1742">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1743">un trait d’Union ou un espace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1743">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1744">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1744">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1745">Non mis en forme : neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1745">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1746">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1747">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1747">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1748">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1749">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1749">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1750">La fonction Func_canadian_sin trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1750">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1751">Au moins deux des éléments suivants, quelle que soit la combinaison :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1751">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1752">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_sin est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1752">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1753">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_sin_collaborative est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1753">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1754">La fonction Func_eu_date trouve une date au format correct.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1754">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1755">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1755">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1756">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1756">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1757">La fonction Func_unformatted_canadian_sin trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1757">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1758">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_sin est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1758">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1759">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1759">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1784">Numéro de carte d’identité Chili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1784">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1785">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1785">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1786">sept à huit chiffres plus des délimiteurs un chiffre ou une lettre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1786">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1787">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1787">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1788">sept à huit chiffres plus des délimiteurs :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1788">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1789">un à deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1789">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1790">un point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1790">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1791">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1791">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1792">un point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1792">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1793">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1793">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1794">un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1794">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1795">un chiffre ou une lettre (ne respectant pas la casse), qui est un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1795">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1796">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1796">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1797">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1797">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1798">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1798">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1799">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1799">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1800">La fonction Func_chile_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1800">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1801">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_chile_id_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1801">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1802">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1802">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1803">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1804">La fonction Func_chile_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1804">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1805">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1805">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1820">Numéro de carte d’identité de résident chinoise (PRC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1820">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1821">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1821">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1822">18 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1822">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1823">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1823">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1824">18 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1824">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1825">six chiffres qui sont un code d’adresse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1825">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1826">huit chiffres au format AAAAMMJJ, qui correspondent à la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1826">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1827">trois chiffres correspondant à un code de commande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1827">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1828">un chiffre qui est un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1828">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1829">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1829">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1830">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1830">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1831">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1831">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1832">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1832">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1833">La fonction Func_china_resident_id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1833">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1834">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_china_resident_id est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1834">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1835">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1836">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1836">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1837">La fonction Func_china_resident_id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1837">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1838">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1838">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1851">Numéro de carte de crédit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1851">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1852">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1853">14 à 16 chiffres qui peuvent être mis en forme ou non (dddddddddddddddd) et qui doivent réussir le test Luhn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1853">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1854">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1855">Modèle très complexe et puissant qui détecte les cartes de visite de toutes les principales marques du monde, notamment Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, etc.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1855">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1856">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1857">Oui, la somme de contrôle de Luhn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1857">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-1858">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1859">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1859">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1860">La fonction Func_credit_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1860">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1861">L’une des affirmations suivantes est vraie :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1861">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1862">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_cc_verification est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1862">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1863">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_cc_name est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1863">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1864">La fonction Func_expiration_date trouve une date au format correct.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1864">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1865">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1865">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-1866">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1866">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1867">La fonction Func_credit_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1867">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-1868">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-1868">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
