## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2128">Numéro de permis de conduire de la Croatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2128">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2129">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2129">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2130">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2130">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2131">huit chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2131">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2132">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2132">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2133">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2133">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2134">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2134">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2135">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2135">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2136">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2136">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2137">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2137">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2138">L’expression régulière  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2138">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2139">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2139">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2155">Numéro de carte d’identité Croatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2155">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2156">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro d’identification national de l’UE et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2156">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2157">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2157">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2158">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2158">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2159">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2159">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2160">neuf chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2160">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2161">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2161">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2162">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2162">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2163">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2163">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2164">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2164">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2165">La fonction Func_croatia_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2165">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2166">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_croatia_id_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2166">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2197">Numéro de passeport croate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2197">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2198">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2198">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2199">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2199">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2200">neuf chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2200">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2201">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2201">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2202">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2202">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2203">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2204">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2204">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2205">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2206">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2206">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2207">L’expression régulière  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2207">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2208">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2208">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2226">Numéro d’identification personnelle de la Croatie (OIB)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2226">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2227">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2228">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2228">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2229">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2230">11 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2230">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2231">dix chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2231">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2232">le chiffre final est un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2232">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2233">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2234">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2234">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2235">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2236">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2236">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2237">La fonction Func_croatia_oib_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2237">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2238">Un mot clé depuis Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2238">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2239">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2239">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2240">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2240">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2241">La fonction Func_croatia_oib_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2241">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2242">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2273">Numéro de sécurité sociale ou identification équivalent de la Croatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2273">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2274">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’information de numéro de sécurité sociale ou d’ID équivalent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2274">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2275">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2276">11 chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2276">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2277">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2278">11 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2278">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2279">dix chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2279">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2280">un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2280">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2281">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2282">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2282">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2283">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2284">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2284">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2285">La fonction  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2285">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2286">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2286">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2287">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2287">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2288">La fonction  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2288">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2305">Numéro de permis de conduire Chypre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2305">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2306">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2306">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2307">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2307">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2308">12 chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2308">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2309">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2309">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2310">12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2310">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2311">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2311">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2312">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2312">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2313">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2313">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2314">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2314">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2315">L’expression régulière  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2315">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2316">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2316">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2331">Carte d’identité Chypre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2331">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2332">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2332">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2333">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2333">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2334">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2334">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2335">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2335">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2336">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2336">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2337">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2337">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2338">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2338">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2339">dix chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2339">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2340">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2340">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2341">dix chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2341">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2342">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2342">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2343">non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2343">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2344">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2344">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2345">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2345">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2346">L’expression régulière  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2346">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2347">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2347">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2356">Numéro de passeport de Chypre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2356">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2357">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2357">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2358">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2358">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2359">une lettre suivie de 6-8 chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2359">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2360">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2360">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2361">une lettre suivie de six à huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2361">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2362">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2363">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2363">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2364">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2365">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2366">L’expression régulière  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2366">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2367">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2367">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2372">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2372">passportid</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2393">Numéro d’identification fiscale de Chypre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2393">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2394">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2394">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2395">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2395">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2396">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2396">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2397">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2397">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2398">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2398">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2399">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2399">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2400">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2400">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2401">huit chiffres et une lettre dans le modèle spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2401">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2402">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2402">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2403">huit chiffres et une lettre :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2403">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2404">« 0 » ou « 9 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2404">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2405">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2405">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2406">une lettre (ne respecte pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2406">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2407">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2407">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2408">non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2408">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2409">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2409">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2410">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2410">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2411">La fonction  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2411">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2412">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2412">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2413">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2413">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2414">La fonction  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2414">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2442">Numéro de permis de conduire tchèque</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2442">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2443">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2443">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2444">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2445">deux lettres suivies de six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2445">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2446">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2447">huit lettres et chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2447">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2448">deux lettres (ne respectent pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2448">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2449">un espace (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2449">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2450">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2450">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2451">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2452">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2452">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2453">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2454">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2454">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2455">L’expression régulière  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2455">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2456">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2456">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2473">Numéro de passeport tchèque</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2473">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2474">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2474">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2476">huit chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2476">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2477">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2478">huit chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2478">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2479">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2480">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2480">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2481">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2482">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2482">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2483">L’expression régulière  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2483">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2484">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2484">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2503">Numéro d’identité personnelle tchèque</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2503">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2504">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2504">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2505">neuf chiffres avec une barre oblique inverse facultative (ancien format) dix chiffres avec une barre oblique facultative (nouveau format)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2505">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2506">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2506">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2507">neuf chiffres (ancien format) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2507">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2508">six chiffres qui représentent la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2508">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2509">une barre oblique facultative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2509">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2510">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2510">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2511">dix chiffres (nouveau format) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2511">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2512">six chiffres qui représentent la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2512">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2513">une barre oblique facultative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2513">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2514">quatre chiffres où le dernier chiffre est un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2514">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2515">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2516">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2516">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2517">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2518">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2518">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2519">La fonction Func_czech_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2519">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2520">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_czech_id_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2520">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2521">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2521">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2522">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2523">La fonction Func_czech_id_card_new_format trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2523">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2524">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2524">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2571">Numéro de sécurité sociale tchèque ou identification équivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2571">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2572">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’information de numéro de sécurité sociale ou d’ID équivalent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2572">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2573">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2573">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2574">10 chiffres et une barre oblique inverse dans le modèle spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2574">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2575">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2575">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2576">dix chiffres et une barre oblique inverse :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2576">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2577">six chiffres correspondant à la date de naissance (AAMMJJ) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2577">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2578">une barre oblique inverse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2578">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2579">trois chiffres correspondant à un numéro de série qui sépare les personnes nés à la même date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2579">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2580">un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2580">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2581">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2582">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2582">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2583">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2584">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2584">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2585">La fonction  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2585">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2586">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2586">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2587">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2587">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2588">La fonction  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2588">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2604">Numéro de permis de conduire Danemark</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2604">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2605">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2605">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2606">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2606">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2607">huit chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2607">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2608">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2608">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2609">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2609">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2610">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2610">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2611">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2611">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2612">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2612">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2613">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2613">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2614">L’expression régulière  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2614">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2615">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2615">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2632">Numéro de passeport Danemark</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2632">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2633">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2633">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2634">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2634">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2635">neuf chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2635">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2636">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2636">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2637">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2637">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2638">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2638">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2639">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2639">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2640">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2640">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2641">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2641">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2642">L’expression régulière  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2642">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2643">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2643">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2660">Numéro d’identification personnel Danemark</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2660">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2661">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2662">dix chiffres contenant un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2662">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2663">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2664">dix chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2664">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2665">six chiffres au format JJMMAA qui correspondent à la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2665">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2666">un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2666">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2667">quatre chiffres où le dernier chiffre est un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2667">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2668">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2669">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2669">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2670">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2671">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2671">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2672">L’expression régulière Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2672">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2673">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_denmark_id est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2673">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2674">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2674">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2675">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2675">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2676">L’expression régulière Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2676">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2677">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2677">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2749">Numéro de sécurité sociale ou identification équivalente Danemark</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2749">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2750">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles n’est disponible que pour le type d’informations sensibles de l’UE ou ID équivalent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2750">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2751">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2752">10 chiffres et un trait d’Union dans le modèle spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2752">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2753">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2754">dix chiffres et un trait d’Union :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2754">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2755">six chiffres correspondant à la date de naissance (JJMMAA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2755">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2756">un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2756">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2757">quatre chiffres correspondant à un numéro de séquence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2757">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2758">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2759">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2759">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2760">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2761">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2762">La fonction  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2762">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2763">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2763">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2764">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2765">La fonction  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2765">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2779">Numéro de la Loi sur la mise en œuvre du médicament (DEA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2779">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2781">deux lettres suivies de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2781">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2782">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2783">Le modèle doit inclure tous les éléments suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2783">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2784">une lettre (ne respecte pas la casse) à partir de cet ensemble de lettres possibles : abcdefghjklmnprstux, qui est un code de l’abonné</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2784">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2785">une lettre (ne respecte pas la casse), qui est la première lettre du nom de famille de l’inscrit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2785">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2786">sept chiffres, dont le dernier est le chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2786">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2787">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2788">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2789">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2790">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2791">La fonction Func_dea_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2791">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2792">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2792">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2795">Numéro de permis de conduire Estonie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2795">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2796">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2796">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2797">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2798">deux lettres suivies de six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2798">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2799">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2800">deux lettres et six chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2800">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2801">les lettres "ET" (ne respectent pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2801">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2802">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2802">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2803">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2804">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2804">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2805">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2806">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2806">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2807">L’expression régulière  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2807">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2808">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2808">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2824">Code d’identification personnel (Estonie)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2824">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2825">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2825">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2826">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2826">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2827">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2827">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2828">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2828">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2829">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2829">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2830">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2830">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2831">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2832">11 chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2832">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2833">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2834">11 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2834">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2835">un chiffre correspondant au sexe et au siècle de naissance (nombre impair mâle, numéro pair femelle ; 1-2:19 siècle ; 3-4:20ème siècle ; 5-6:21ème siècle)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2835">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2836">six chiffres correspondant à la date de naissance (AAMMJJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2836">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2837">trois chiffres correspondant à un numéro de série séparant les personnes nés à la même date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2837">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2838">un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2838">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2839">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2840">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2840">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2841">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2842">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2842">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2843">La fonction  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2843">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2844">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2844">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2845">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2845">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2846">La fonction  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2846">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2879">Numéro de passeport Estonie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2879">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2880">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2880">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2881">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2882">une lettre suivie de sept chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2882">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2883">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2884">une lettre suivie de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2884">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2885">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2886">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2886">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2887">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2888">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2888">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2889">L’expression régulière  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2889">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2890">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2890">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
