## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2905">Numéro de carte de crédit de l'UE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2905">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2906">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2907">16 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2907">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2908">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2908">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2909">Modèle très complexe et puissant</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2909">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2910">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2911">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2911">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2912">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-2913">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2913">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2914">La fonction Func_eu_debit_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2914">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2915">Au moins une des affirmations suivantes est vraie :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2915">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2916">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_eu_debit_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2916">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2917">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_card_terms_dict est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2917">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2918">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_card_security_terms_dict est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2918">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2919">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2919">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2920">La fonction Func_expiration_date trouve une date au format correct.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2920">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2921">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2921">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2922">Mots clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2922">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_eu_debit_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-2923">Keyword_eu_debit_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2923">Keyword_eu_debit_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2924">numéro de compte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2924">account number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2925">numéro de carte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2925">card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-2926">n° carte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-2926">card no.</span></span>

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3367">Numéro de permis de conduire Finlande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3367">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3368">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3368">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3369">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3370">dix chiffres contenant un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3370">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3371">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3372">dix chiffres contenant un trait d’Union :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3372">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3373">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3373">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3374">un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3374">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3375">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3375">four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3376">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3376">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3377">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3377">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3378">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3378">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3379">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3379">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3380">L’expression régulière  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3380">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3381">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3381">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3397">Numéro d’assurance maladie européenne pour la Finlande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3397">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3398">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3398">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3399">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3399">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3400">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3400">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3401">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3401">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3402">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3402">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3403">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3403">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3404">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3405">numéro à 20 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3405">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3406">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3407">nombre à 20 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3407">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3408">dix chiffres-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3408">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3409">un espace ou un tiret facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3409">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3410">dix chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3410">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3411">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3411">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3412">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3412">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3413">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3413">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3414">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3414">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3415">L’expression Regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3415">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3416">Un mot clé depuis Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3416">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3434">ID national de Finlande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3434">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3435">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3436">six chiffres plus un caractère indiquant un siècle plus trois chiffres plus un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3436">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3437">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3437">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3438">Le modèle doit inclure tous les éléments suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3438">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3439">six chiffres au format de format JJMMAA qui correspondent à une date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3439">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3440">marqueur siècle (« - », « + » ou « a »)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3440">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3441">Numéro d’identification personnel à trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3441">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3442">un chiffre ou une lettre (ne respectant pas la casse), qui est un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3442">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3443">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3444">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3445">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3446">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3446">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3447">la fonction Func_finnish_national_id trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3447">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3448">un mot clé depuis Keyword_finnish_national_id est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3448">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3449">le checksum passe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3449">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3450">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3450">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3451">la fonction Func_finnish_national_id trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3451">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3452">le checksum passe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3452">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3501">Numéro de passeport de Finlande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3501">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3502">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3502">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3503">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3503">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3504">combinaison de neuf lettres et chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3504">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3505">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3505">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3506">combinaison de neuf lettres et chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3506">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3507">deux lettres (ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3507">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3508">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3508">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3509">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3510">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3510">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3511">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3512">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3512">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3513">L’expression régulière Regex_finland_passport_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3513">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3514">Un mot clé depuis Keywords_eu_passport_number_common ou Keyword_finland_passport_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3514">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3535">Numéro de sécurité sociale Finlande ou identification équivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3535">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3536">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’information de numéro de sécurité sociale ou d’ID équivalent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3536">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3537">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3538">Combinaison de 11 caractères au format spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3538">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3539">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3540">combinaison de 11 caractères au format spécifié :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3540">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3541">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3541">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3542">une instance de l’un des éléments suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3542">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3543">symbole plus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3543">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3544">symbole moins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3544">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3545">la lettre « A » (ne respecte pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3545">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3546">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3546">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3547">une lettre ou un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3547">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3548">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3548">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3549">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3549">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3550">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3550">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3551">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3551">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3552">La fonction  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3552">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3553">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3553">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3554">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3554">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3555">La fonction  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3555">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3579">Numéro de permis de conduire France</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3579">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3580">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de permis de conduire de l’UE et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3580">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3581">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3581">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3582">12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3582">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3583">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3583">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3584">12 chiffres avec validation pour écarter les modèles similaires, comme les numéros de téléphone français</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3584">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3585">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3585">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3586">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3586">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3587">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3587">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3588">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3588">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3589">la fonction Func_french_drivers_license trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3589">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3590">au moins l’une des conditions suivantes est vraie :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3590">at least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3591">un mot clé depuis Keyword_french_drivers_license est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3591">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3592">la fonction Func_eu_date trouve une date au format de date correct.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3592">the function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3604">Numéro d’assurance maladie France</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3604">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3605">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3605">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3606">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3606">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3607">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3607">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3608">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3608">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3609">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3609">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3610">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3610">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3611">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3612">nombre à 21 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3612">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3613">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3614">nombre à 21 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3614">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3615">dix chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3615">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3616">un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3616">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3617">dix chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3617">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3618">un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3618">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3619">un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3619">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3620">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3620">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3621">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3621">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3622">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3622">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3623">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3623">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3624">l’expression Regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3624">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3625">un mot clé depuis Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3625">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3631">Carte d’identité nationale (CNI) France</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3631">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3632">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3632">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3634">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3634">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3635">12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3635">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3636">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3636">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3637">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3637">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3639">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3639">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3640">L’expression régulière Regex_france_cni trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3640">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">

        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />

      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3655">Numéro de passeport français</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3655">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3656">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3656">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3657">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3658">neuf chiffres et lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3658">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3659">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3660">neuf chiffres et lettres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3660">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3661">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3661">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3662">deux lettres (ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3662">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3663">cinq chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3663">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3664">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3664">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3665">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3665">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3666">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3666">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3667">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3667">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3668">La fonction Func_fr_passport trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3668">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3669">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_passport est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3669">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3690">Numéro de sécurité sociale (INSEE) français ou identification équivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3690">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3691">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le numéro de sécurité sociale de l’UE et un type d’informations sensibles ID équivalent et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3691">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3692">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3693">15 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3693">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3694">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3695">Doit correspondre à l’un des deux modèles suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3695">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3696">13 chiffres suivis d’un espace suivi de deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3696">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3697">ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3697">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3698">15 chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3698">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3699">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3699">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3700">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3700">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3701">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3701">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3702">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 95 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3702">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3703">La fonction Func_french_insee ou Func_fr_insee trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3703">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3704">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_fr_insee est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3704">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3705">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3705">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3706">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3706">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3707">La fonction Func_french_insee ou Func_fr_insee trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3707">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3708">Aucun mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_fr_insee n’est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3708">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3709">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3709">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3735">Numéro d’identification fiscale France</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3735">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3736">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3737">13 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3737">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3738">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3739">13 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3739">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3740">Un chiffre qui doit être 0, 1, 2 ou 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3740">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3741">1 chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3741">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3742">Un espace (facultatif) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3742">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3743">2 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3743">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3744">Un espace (facultatif) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3744">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3745">3 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3745">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3746">Un espace (facultatif) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3746">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3747">3 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3747">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3748">Un espace (facultatif) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3748">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3749">3 chiffres de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3749">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3750">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3751">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3751">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3752">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3753">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3753">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3754">La fonction  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3754">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3755">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3755">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3756">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3756">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3757">La fonction  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3757">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3758">Mots clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3758">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3759">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3759">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3760">Numéro d’identification fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3760">numéro d'identification fiscale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3761">id fiscal
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3761">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3762">n ° d’identification fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3762">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3763">Numéro d’identification de taxe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3763">tax identification number</span></span>

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3777">Numéro de TVA de la valeur ajoutée France</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3777">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3778">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3778">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3779">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3779">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3780">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3780">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3781">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3781">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3782">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3782">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3783">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3783">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3784">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3784">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3785">modèle alphanumérique de 13 caractères</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3785">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3786">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3786">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3787">modèle alphanumérique de 13 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3787">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3788">deux lettres-FR (ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3788">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3789">un espace ou un tiret facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3789">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3790">deux lettres ou chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3790">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3791">espace, point, tiret ou virgule facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3791">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3792">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3792">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3793">espace, point, tiret ou virgule facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3793">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3794">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3794">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3795">espace, point, tiret ou virgule facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3795">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3796">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3796">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3797">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3798">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3798">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3799">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3800">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3800">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3801">La fonction Func_france_value_added_tax_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3801">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3802">Un mot clé depuis Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3802">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3803">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3804">La fonction Func_france_value_added_tax_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3804">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3817">Numéro de permis de conduire Allemagne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3817">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3818">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3818">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3819">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3820">combinaison de 11 chiffres et lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3820">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3821">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3822">11 chiffres et lettres (ne respectent pas la casse) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3822">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3823">un chiffre ou une lettre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3823">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3824">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3824">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3825">six chiffres ou lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3825">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3826">un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3826">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3827">un chiffre ou une lettre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3827">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3828">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3829">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3829">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3830">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3831">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3831">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3832">La fonction Func_german_drivers_license trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3832">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3833">Au moins une des affirmations suivantes est vraie :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3833">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3834">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_german_drivers_license_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3834">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3835">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3835">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3836">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_german_drivers_license est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3836">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3837">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3837">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3930">Numéro de carte d’identité Allemagne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3930">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3931">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3931">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3932">depuis le 1er novembre 2010 : neuf lettres et chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3932">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3933">du 1er avril 1987 au 31 octobre 2010:10 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3933">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3934">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3935">depuis le 1er novembre 2010 :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3935">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3936">une lettre (ne respecte pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3936">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3937">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3937">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3938">du 1er avril 1987 au 31 octobre 2010 :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3938">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3939">dix chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3939">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3940">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3941">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3941">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3942">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3943">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3943">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3944">L’expression régulière Regex_germany_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3944">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3945">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_germany_id_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3945">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3961">Numéro de passeport allemand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3961">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3962">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3962">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3963">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3963">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3964">10 chiffres ou lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3964">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3965">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3965">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3966">Le modèle doit inclure tous les éléments suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3966">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3967">le premier caractère est un chiffre ou une lettre de cet ensemble (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3967">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3968">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3968">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3969">cinq chiffres ou lettres de cet ensemble (C,-H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3969">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3970">un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3970">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3971">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3971">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3972">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3972">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3973">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3973">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3974">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3974">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3975">La fonction Func_german_passport trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3975">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3976">Un mot clé from `Keyword_german_passport` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3976">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3977">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3977">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3978">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3978">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3979">La fonction Func_german_passport_data trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3979">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3980">Un mot clé from `Keyword_german_passport` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3980">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3981">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3981">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3993">Numéro d’identification fiscale de l’Allemagne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3993">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3994">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3994">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3995">11 chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3995">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-3996">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3996">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-3997">11 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3997">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3998">Deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3998">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-3999">Un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-3999">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4000">Trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4000">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4001">Un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4001">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4002">Trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4002">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4003">Un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4003">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4004">Deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4004">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4005">un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4005">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4006">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4006">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4007">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4007">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4008">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4008">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4009">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4009">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4010">La fonction  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4010">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4011">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4011">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4012">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4012">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4013">La fonction  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4013">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4039">Numéro de TVA de la valeur ajoutée Germany</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4039">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4040">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4040">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4041">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4041">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4042">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4042">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4043">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4043">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4044">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4044">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4045">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4045">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4046">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4046">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4047">modèle alphanumérique de 11 caractères</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4047">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4048">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4048">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4049">modèle alphanumérique de 11 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4049">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4050">lettre D ou d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4050">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4051">lettre E ou e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4051">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4052">un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4052">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4053">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4053">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4054">espace ou virgule facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4054">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4055">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4055">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4056">espace ou virgule facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4056">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4057">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4057">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4058">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4059">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4059">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4060">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4061">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4061">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4062">La fonction Func_germany_value_added_tax_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4062">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4063">Un mot clé depuis Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4063">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4064">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4064">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4065">La fonction Func_germany_value_added_tax_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4065">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
