## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4075">Numéro de permis de conduire Grèce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4075">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4076">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4076">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4077">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4078">neuf chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4078">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4079">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4080">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4080">nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4084">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">

</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4103">Carte d’identité nationale Grèce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4103">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4104">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4105">Combinaison de 7 ou 8 lettres et chiffres, plus un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4105">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4106">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4106">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4107">Sept lettres et chiffres (ancien format) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4107">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4108">Une lettre (de l’alphabet grec) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4108">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4109">Un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4109">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4110">Six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4110">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4111">Huit lettres et chiffres (nouveau format) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4111">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4112">Deux lettres dont le caractère majuscule figure à la fois dans l’alphabet grec et l’alphabet latin (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4112">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4113">Un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4113">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4114">Six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4114">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4115">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4116">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4116">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4117">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4118">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4118">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4119">L’expression régulière Regex_greece_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4119">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4120">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_greece_id_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4120">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4121">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4121">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4122">L’expression régulière Regex_greece_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4122">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4133">Numéro de passeport Grèce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4133">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4134">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4134">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4135">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4135">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4136">Deux lettres suivies de sept chiffres, sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4136">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4137">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4137">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4138">Deux lettres suivies de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4138">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4139">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4140">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4140">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4141">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4142">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4143">L’expression régulière  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4143">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4144">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4144">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4162">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4162">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4163">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4163">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4170">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4171">Neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4171">Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4173">Non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4173">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4174">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4175">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4176">L’expression régulière  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4176">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4177">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4177">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml

      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4206">Numéro de carte d’identité (HKID) Hong Kong</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4206">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4207">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4207">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4208">Combinaison de 8 ou 9 lettres et chiffres plus éventuellement des parenthèses autour du dernier caractère</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4208">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4209">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4209">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4210">Combinaison de 8 ou 9 lettres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4210">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4211">1 ou 2 lettres (ne respectant pas la casse) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4211">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4212">Six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4212">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4213">Le dernier caractère (un chiffre ou la lettre A), qui est le chiffre de contrôle et est éventuellement entre parenthèses.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4213">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4214">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4215">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4216">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4217">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4217">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4218">La fonction Func_hong_kong_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4218">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4219">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_hong_kong_id_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4219">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4220">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4221">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4221">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4222">La fonction Func_hong_kong_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4222">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4223">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4223">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4263">Numéro de permis de conduire hongrois</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4263">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4264">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4264">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4265">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4265">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4266">Deux lettres suivies de six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4266">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4267">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4268">Deux lettres et six chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4268">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4269">Deux lettres (ne respectent pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4269">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4270">Six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4270">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4271">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4271">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4272">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4272">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4273">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4273">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4274">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4274">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4275">L’expression régulière  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4275">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4276">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4276">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4292">Numéro d’identification personnel Hongrie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4292">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4293">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4293">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4294">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4294">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4295">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4295">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4296">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4296">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4297">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4297">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4298">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4298">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4299">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4299">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4300">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4300">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4301">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4301">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4302">11 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4302">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4303">Un chiffre correspondant au sexe (1-mâle, 2 femelles), d’autres numéros sont également possibles pour les citoyens nés avant 1900 ou les citoyens ayant une double citoyenneté.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4303">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4304">Six chiffres correspondant à la date de naissance (AAMMJJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4304">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4305">Trois chiffres correspondant à un numéro de série</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4305">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4306">Un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4306">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4307">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4307">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4308">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4308">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4309">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4309">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4310">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4310">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4311">La fonction  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4311">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4312">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4312">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4313">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4313">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4314">La fonction  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4314">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4325">Numéro de passeport Hongrie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4325">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4326">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4326">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4327">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4328">Deux lettres suivies de six ou sept chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4328">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4329">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4330">Deux lettres suivies de six ou sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4330">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4331">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4331">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4332">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4332">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4333">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4333">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4334">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4334">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4335">L’expression régulière  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4335">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4336">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4336">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4353">Numéro de sécurité sociale ou identification équivalente Hongrie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4353">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4354">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’information de numéro de sécurité sociale ou d’ID équivalent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4354">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4355">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4355">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4356">Neuf chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4356">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4357">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4357">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4358">Neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4358">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4359">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4360">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4360">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4361">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4362">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4362">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4363">La fonction  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4363">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4364">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4364">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4365">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4366">La fonction  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4366">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4386">Numéro d’identification de taxe Hongrie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4386">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4387">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4387">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4388">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4388">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4389">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4389">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4390">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4390">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4391">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4391">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4392">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4392">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4393">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4394">Dix chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4394">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4395">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4395">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4396">Dix chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4396">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4397">Un chiffre qui doit être « 8 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4397">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4398">Huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4398">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4399">Un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4399">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4400">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4401">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4401">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4402">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4403">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4403">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4404">La fonction  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4404">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4405">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4405">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4406">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4406">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4407">La fonction  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4407">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4408">Mots clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4408">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4409">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4409">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4410">adóazonosító szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4410">adóazonosító szám</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4433">Numéro de taxe de la valeur ajoutée à la Hongrie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4433">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4434">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4434">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4435">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4435">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4436">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4436">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4437">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4437">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4438">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4438">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4439">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4439">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4440">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4441">modèle alphanumérique de 10 caractères</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4441">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4442">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4443">modèle alphanumérique à 10 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4443">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4444">2 lettres-HU ou HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4444">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4445">espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4445">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4446">8 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4446">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4447">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4448">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4448">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4449">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4450">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4450">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4451">La fonction Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4451">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4452">Un mot clé depuis Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4452">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4453">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4454">La fonction Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4454">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4468">Numéro de compte permanent Inde (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4468">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4469">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4470">10 lettres ou chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4470">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4471">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4472">10 lettres ou chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4472">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4473">Cinq lettres (ne respectant pas la casse) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4473">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4474">Quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4474">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4475">Une lettre qui est un chiffre de contrôle alphabétique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4475">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4476">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4476">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4477">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4477">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4478">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4478">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4479">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4479">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4480">L’expression régulière Regex_india_permanent_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4480">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4481">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_india_permanent_account_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4481">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4482">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4482">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4483">Mots clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4483">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4485">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4485">Permanent Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4487">Numéro d’identification unique (Aadhaar) Inde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4487">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4488">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4488">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4489">12 chiffres contenant éventuellement des espaces ou des tirets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4489">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4490">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4490">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4491">12 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4491">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4492">Quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4492">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4493">Éventuellement un tiret ou un espace </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4493">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4494">Quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4494">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4495">Éventuellement un tiret ou un espace </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4495">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4496">Le chiffre final, qui est le chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4496">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4497">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4498">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4498">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4499">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4500">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4500">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4501">La fonction Func_india_aadhaar trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4501">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4502">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_india_aadhar est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4502">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4503">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4503">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4504">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4504">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4505">La fonction Func_india_aadhaar trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4505">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4506">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4506">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4513">Numéro de carte d’identité (KTP) Indonésie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4513">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4514">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4515">16 chiffres contenant éventuellement des points</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4515">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4516">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4517">16 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4517">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4518">Code à deux chiffres désignant la province </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4518">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4519">Un point (facultatif) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4519">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4520">Code à deux chiffres désignant une régence ou une ville </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4520">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4521">Code à deux chiffres désignant un sous-district </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4521">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4522">Un point (facultatif) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4522">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4523">Six chiffres au format JJMMAA qui correspondent à la date de naissance </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4523">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4524">Un point (facultatif) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4524">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4525">Quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4525">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4526">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4526">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4527">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4527">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4528">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4528">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4529">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4529">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4530">L’expression régulière Regex_indonesia_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4530">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4531">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_indonesia_id_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4531">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
</Entity>
```

## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4537">Numéro de compte bancaire international (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4537">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4538">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4539">Code pays (à deux lettres) plus chiffres de contrôle (à deux chiffres) plus numéro BBAN (jusqu’à 30 chiffres)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4539">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4540">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4541">Le modèle doit inclure tous les éléments suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4541">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4542">Code pays à deux lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4542">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4543">Deux chiffres de contrôle (suivis d’un espace facultatif) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4543">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4544">1 à 7 groupes de quatre lettres ou chiffres (séparés par des espaces facultatifs)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4544">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4545">1 à 3 lettres ou chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4545">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-p133">Le format pour chaque pays est légèrement différent. Le type d’informations sensibles IBAN recouvre ces 60 pays :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-p133">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4548">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4548">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4549">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4549">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4550">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4550">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4551">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4551">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4552">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4552">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4553">La fonction Func_iban trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4553">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4554">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4554">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4558">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4558">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4559">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4559">Dictionary</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4563">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4563">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4565">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4565">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4569">Un mot clé depuis Dictionary_icd_10_ mis à jour est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4569">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml

        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4571">Tout terme du dictionnaire de mots clés Dictionary_icd_10_updated, qui est basé sur la [Classification internationale des maladies, dixième révision, modification clinique (ICD-10-cm)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4571">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4572">Ce type recherche uniquement le terme, pas les codes d’assurance.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4572">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4573">Tout terme du dictionnaire de mots clés Dictionary_icd_10_codes, qui est basé sur la [Classification internationale des maladies, dixième révision, modification clinique (ICD-10-cm)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4573">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4574">Ce type recherche uniquement les codes d’assurance, pas la description.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4574">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4587">Un mot clé depuis Dictionary_icd_9_updated est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4587">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4589">Tout terme du dictionnaire de mots clés Dictionary_icd_9_updated, qui est basé sur la [Classification internationale des maladies, neuvième révision, modification clinique (ICD-9-cm)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4589">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4590">Ce type recherche uniquement le terme, pas les codes d’assurance.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4590">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4593">Adresse IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4593">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4594">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4594">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4595">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4595">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4596">Modèle complexe qui tient compte des versions mises en forme (points) et non mises en forme (sans points) des adresses IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4596">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4597">IPv4/IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4597">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4598"> Modèle complexe qui tient compte des numéros IPv6 mis en forme (qui incluent les signes deux-points)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4598">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4599">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4599">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4600">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4600">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4601">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4601">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4602">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4602">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4603">Pour IPv6, le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4603">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4604">L’expression régulière Regex_ipv6_address trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4604">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4605">Aucun mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_ipaddress n’est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4605">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4606">Pour IPv4, le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 95 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4606">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4607">L’expression régulière Regex_ipv4_address trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4607">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4608">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_ipaddress est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4608">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4609">Pour IPv6, le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 95 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4609">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4610">L’expression régulière Regex_ipv6_address trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4610">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4611">Aucun mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_ipaddress n’est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4611">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4619">Numéro de permis de conduire Ireland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4619">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4620">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4620">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4621">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4621">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4622">Six chiffres suivis de quatre lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4622">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4623">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4623">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4624">Six chiffres et quatre lettres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4624">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4625">Six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4625">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4626">Quatre lettres (ne respectent pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4626">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4627">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4627">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4628">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4628">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4629">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4629">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4630">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4630">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4631">L’expression régulière  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4631">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4632">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4632">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4648">Numéro de passeport Irlande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4648">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4649">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4649">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4650">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4651">Deux lettres ou chiffres suivis de sept chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4651">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4652">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4653">Deux lettres ou chiffres suivis de sept chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4653">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4654">Deux chiffres ou lettres (ne respectent pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4654">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4655">Sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4655">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4656">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4657">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4657">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4658">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4659">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4659">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4660">L’expression régulière  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4660">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4661">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4661">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
