## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4682">Numéro PPS (Personal public service) pour l’Irlande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4682">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4684">Ancien format (jusqu’au 31 décembre 2012) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4684">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4685">sept chiffres suivis de 1-2 lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4685">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4686">Nouveau format (1er janvier 2013 et après) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4686">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4687">sept chiffres suivis de deux lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4687">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4688">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4689">Ancien format (jusqu’au 31 décembre 2012) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4689">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4690">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4690">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4691">une à deux lettres (ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4691">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4692">Nouveau format (1er janvier 2013 et après) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4692">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4693">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4693">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4694">une lettre (ne respectant pas la casse), qui est un chiffre de contrôle alphabétique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4694">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4695">Une lettre facultative dans la plage A-I, ou « W »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4695">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4696">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4697">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4697">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4698">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4699">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4699">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4700">La fonction Func_ireland_pps trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4700">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4701">Un mot clé depuis Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4701">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4702">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4702">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4703">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4703">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4704">La fonction Func_ireland_pps trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4704">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4705">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4705">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4750">Numéro de compte bancaire Israël</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4750">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4751">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4752">13 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4752">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4753">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4754">Avec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4754">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4755">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4755">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4756">un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4756">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4757">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4757">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4758">un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4758">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4759">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4759">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4760">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4760">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4761">	13 chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4761">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4762">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4763">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4763">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4764">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4765">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4765">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4766">L’expression régulière Regex_israel_bank_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4766">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4767">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_israel_bank_account_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4767">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4768">Mots clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4768">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4769">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4769">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4770">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4770">Bank Account Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4772">Numéro de compte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4772">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4773">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4773">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4774">Numéro d’identification nationale Israël</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4774">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4775">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4776">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4776">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4777">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4777">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4778">neuf chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4778">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4779">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4779">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4780">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4780">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4781">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4781">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4782">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4782">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4783">La fonction Func_israeli_national_id_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4783">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4784">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_Israel_National_ID est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4784">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4785">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4785">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4786">Mots clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4786">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4787">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4787">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4788">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4788">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4789">Numéro d’identification nationale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4789">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4790">Numéro de permis de conduire Italie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4790">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4791">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4791">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4792">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4793">une combinaison de 10 lettres et chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4793">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4794">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4794">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4795">une combinaison de 10 lettres et chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4795">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4796">une lettre (ne respecte pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4796">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4797">la lettre « A » ou « V » (ne respecte pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4797">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4798">sept lettres (ne respectent pas la casse), des chiffres ou le trait de soulignement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4798">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4799">une lettre (ne respecte pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4799">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4800">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4801">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4801">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4802">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4803">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4804">L’expression régulière Regex_italy_drivers_license_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4804">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4805">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4805">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4806">Mots clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4806">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4807">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4807">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4808">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4808">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4809">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4809">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4810">Code fiscal Italie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4810">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4811">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4811">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4812">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4812">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4813">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4813">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4814">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4814">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4815">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4815">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4816">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4816">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4817">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4817">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4818">combinaison de 16 caractères de lettres et de chiffres dans le modèle spécifié.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4818">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4819">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4819">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4820">Combinaison de lettres et de chiffres de 16 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4820">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4821">trois lettres qui correspondent aux trois premières consonnes du nom de la famille</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4821">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4822">trois lettres qui correspondent à la première, troisième et quatrième consonnes du prénom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4822">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4823">deux chiffres correspondant aux derniers chiffres de l’année de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4823">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4824">une lettre correspondant à la lettre du mois de naissance : les lettres sont utilisées dans l’ordre alphabétique, mais seules les lettres de A à E, H, L, M, P, R à T sont utilisées (par conséquent, le mois de janvier est A et le mois d’octobre est R).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4824">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4825">deux chiffres correspondant au jour du mois de naissance — afin de différencier les hommes, 40 est ajouté au jour de naissance pour les femmes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4825">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4826">quatre chiffres correspondant à l’indicatif régional propre à la municipalité où la personne est né (des codes pays sont utilisés pour les pays étrangers)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4826">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4827">un chiffre de parité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4827">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4828">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4829">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4829">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4830">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4831">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4831">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4832">La fonction  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4832">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4833">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4833">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4834">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4834">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4835">La fonction  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4835">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4870">Numéro de passeport Italie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4870">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4871">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4871">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4872">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4872">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4873">deux lettres ou chiffres suivis de sept chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4873">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4874">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4875">deux lettres ou chiffres suivis de sept chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4875">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4876">deux chiffres ou lettres (ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4876">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4877">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4877">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4878">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4878">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4879">non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4879">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4880">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4880">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4881">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4881">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4882">L’expression régulière  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4882">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4883">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4883">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4904">Numéro de TVA Italie valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4904">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4905">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4905">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4906">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4906">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4907">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4907">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4908">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4908">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4909">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4909">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4910">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4910">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4911">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4911">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4912">modèle alphanumérique de 13 caractères avec délimiteurs facultatifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4912">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4913">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4913">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4914">modèle alphanumérique de 13 caractères avec délimiteurs facultatifs :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4914">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4915">I ou i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4915">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4916">T ou t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4916">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4917">espace, point, tiret ou virgule facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4917">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4918">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4918">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4919">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4920">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4920">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4921">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4922">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4922">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4923">La fonction Func_italy_value_added_tax_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4923">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4924">Un mot clé depuis Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4924">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4925">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4925">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4926">La fonction Func_italy_value_added_tax_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4926">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4934">Numéro de compte bancaire japonais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4934">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4935">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4936">sept ou huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4936">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4937">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4938">Numéro de compte bancaire :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4938">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4939">sept ou huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4939">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4940">Code de succursale du compte bancaire :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4940">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4941">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4941">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4942">un espace ou un tiret (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4942">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4943">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4943">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4944">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4945">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-4946">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4947">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4947">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4948">La fonction Func_jp_bank_account trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4948">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4949">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_jp_bank_account est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4949">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4950">L’une des affirmations suivantes est vraie :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4950">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4951">La fonction Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4951">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4952">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4952">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-4953">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4953">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4954">La fonction Func_jp_bank_account trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4954">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-4955">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_jp_bank_account est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-4955">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5014">Numéro de permis de conduire Japon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5014">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5015">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5016">12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5016">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5017">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5018">12 chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5018">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5019">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5020">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5020">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5021">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5022">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5022">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5023">La fonction Func_jp_drivers_license_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5023">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5024">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5024">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5064">12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5064">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5065">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5065">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5066">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5066">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5067">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5067">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5068">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5068">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5069">La fonction Func_japanese_my_number_corporate trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5069">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5070">Un mot clé depuis Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5070">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5071">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5071">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5072">La fonction Func_japanese_my_number_corporate trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5072">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5098">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5098">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5099">espace, point ou tiret facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5099">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5101">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5101">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5102">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5102">Yes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5104">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5104">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5107">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5107">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5108">La fonction Func_japanese_my_number_personal trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5108">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5121">Numéro de passeport japonais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5121">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5122">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5122">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5123">deux lettres suivies de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5123">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5124">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5124">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5125">deux lettres (ne respectant pas la casse) suivies de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5125">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5126">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5126">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5127">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5127">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5128">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5128">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5129">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5129">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5130">La fonction Func_jp_passport trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5130">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5131">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_jp_passport est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5131">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5138">Numéro de carte de séjour Japon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5138">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5141">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5142">12 lettres et chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5142">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5143">deux lettres (ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5143">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5145">deux lettres (ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5145">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5146">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5146">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5147">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5147">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5149">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5149">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5150">L’expression régulière Regex_jp_residence_card_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5150">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5153">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5153">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5154">Numéro de carte de séjour</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5154">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5155">N ° carte de séjour</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5155">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5156">Carte de séjour #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5156">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5157">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5157">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5158">Numéro d’enregistrement de résident Japon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5158">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5159">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5159">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5160">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5160">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5161">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5161">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5162">11 chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5162">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5163">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5164">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5164">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5165">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5166">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5166">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5167">La fonction Func_jp_resident_registration_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5167">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5168">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5168">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5182">Numéro d’assurance sociale japonaise (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5182">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5184">7 à 12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5184">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5185">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5186">7 à 12 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5186">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5187">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5187">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5188">un trait d’Union (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5188">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5189">six chiffres ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5189">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5190">7 à 12 chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5190">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5191">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5192">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5193">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5194">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5195">La fonction Func_jp_sin trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5195">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5196">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_jp_sin est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5196">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5197">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5197">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5198">La fonction Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5198">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5199">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_jp_sin est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5199">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5200">Mots clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5200">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5201">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5201">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5202">N° d’assurance sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5202">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5203">Numéro d’assurance sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5203">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5204">Numéro d’assurance sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5204">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5205">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5205">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5206">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5206">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5207">Numéro de permis de conduire de la Lettonie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5207">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5208">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5208">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5209">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5209">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5210">trois lettres suivies de six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5210">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5211">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5211">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5212">trois lettres et six chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5212">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5213">trois lettres (ne respectent pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5213">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5214">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5214">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5215">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5215">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5216">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5216">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5217">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5217">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5218">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5219">L’expression régulière  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5219">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5220">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5220">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5222">Keywords_latvia_eu_driver’s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5222">Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5236">Code personnel en Lettonie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5236">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5237">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5238">11 chiffres et trait d’union conditionnel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5238">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5239">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5240">Ancien format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5240">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5241">11 chiffres et un trait d’Union :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5241">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5242">six chiffres correspondant à la date de naissance (JJMMAA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5242">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5243">un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5243">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5244">un chiffre correspondant au siècle de naissance (« 0 » pour le 19 siècle, « 1 » pour le vingtième siècle et « 2 » pour le 21ème siècle).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5244">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5245">quatre chiffres, généré de manière aléatoire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5245">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5246">Nouveau format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5246">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5247">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5247">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5248">Deux chiffres "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5248">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5249">Neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5249">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5250">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5251">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5251">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5252">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5253">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5253">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5254">La fonction  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` ou l’expression régulière `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5254">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5255">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5255">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5256">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5256">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5257">La fonction  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` ou l’expression régulière `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5257">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5320">Numéro de passeport Lettonie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5320">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5321">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5321">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5322">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5322">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5323">deux lettres ou chiffres suivis de sept chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5323">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5324">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5324">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5325">deux lettres ou chiffres suivis de sept chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5325">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5326">deux chiffres ou lettres (ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5326">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5327">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5327">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5328">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5329">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5329">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5330">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5331">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5331">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5332">L’expression régulière  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5332">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5333">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5333">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5353">Numéro de permis de conduire de la Lituanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5353">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5354">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5354">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5355">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5355">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5356">huit chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5356">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5357">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5357">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5358">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5358">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5359">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5360">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5360">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5361">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5362">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5362">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5363">L’expression régulière  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5363">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5364">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5364">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
