## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5380">Code personnel de Lituanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5380">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5381">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5381">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5382">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5382">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5383">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5383">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5384">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5384">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5385">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5385">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5386">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5386">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5387">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5388">11 chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5388">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5389">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5390">11 chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5390">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5391">un chiffre (1-6) correspondant au sexe et au siècle de la personne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5391">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5392">six chiffres correspondant à la date de naissance (AAMMJJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5392">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5393">trois chiffres correspondant au numéro de série de la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5393">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5394">un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5394">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5395">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5395">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5396">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5396">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5397">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5397">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5398">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5398">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5399">La fonction  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5399">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5400">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5400">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5401">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5401">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5402">La fonction  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5402">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5437">Numéro de passeport Lituanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5437">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5438">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5438">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5439">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5440">huit chiffres ou lettres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5440">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5441">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5441">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5442">huit chiffres ou lettres (ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5442">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5443">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5444">non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5444">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5445">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5446">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5446">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5447">L’expression régulière  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5447">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5448">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5448">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5465">Numéro de permis de conduire du Luxembourg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5465">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5466">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5466">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5467">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5467">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5468">six chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5468">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5469">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5469">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5470">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5470">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5471">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5471">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5472">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5472">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5473">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5473">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5474">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5475">L’expression régulière  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5475">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5476">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5476">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5477">Mots clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5477">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_luxemburg_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5478">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver’s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5478">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5492">Numéro d’identification nationale du Luxembourg (personnes physiques)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5492">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5493">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5493">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5494">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5494">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5495">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5495">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5496">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5496">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5497">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5497">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5498">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5498">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5499">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5499">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5500">13 chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5500">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5501">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5501">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5502">13 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5502">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5503">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5503">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5504">deux chiffres de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5504">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5505">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5505">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5506">oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5506">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5507">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5507">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5508">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5508">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5509">La fonction  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5509">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5510">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5510">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5511">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5511">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5512">La fonction  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5512">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5535">Numéro de passeport Luxembourg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5535">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5536">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5536">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5537">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5538">huit chiffres ou lettres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5538">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5539">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5540">huit chiffres ou lettres (ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5540">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5541">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5541">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5542">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5542">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5543">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5543">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5544">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5545">L’expression régulière  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5545">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5546">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5546">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5553">Numéro d’identification nationale du Luxembourg (personnes non physiques)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5553">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5554">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5555">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5555">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5556">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5557">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5557">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5558">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5558">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5559">un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5559">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5560">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5560">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5561">un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5561">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5562">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5562">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5563">un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5563">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5564">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5564">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5565">un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5565">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5566">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5566">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5567">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5567">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5568">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5568">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5569">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5569">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5570">La fonction  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5570">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5571">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5571">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5572">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5573">La fonction  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5573">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5613">Numéro de carte d’identification de Malaisie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5613">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5614">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5614">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5615">12 chiffres contenant éventuellement des traits d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5615">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5616">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5616">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5617">12 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5617">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5618">six chiffres au format AAMMJJ correspondant à la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5618">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5619">un tiret (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5619">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5620">Code de lieu de naissance à deux lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5620">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5621">un tiret (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5621">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5622">trois chiffres aléatoires</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5622">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5623">Code de sexe à un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5623">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5624">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5625">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5625">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5626">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5627">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5627">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5628">L’expression régulière Regex_malaysia_id_card_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5628">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5629">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5629">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5656">Numéro de permis de conduire Malte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5656">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5657">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5657">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5658">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5659">Combinaison de deux caractères et six chiffres dans le modèle spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5659">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5660">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5661">combinaison de deux caractères et six chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5661">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5662">deux caractères (chiffres ou lettres, ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5662">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5663">un espace (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5663">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5664">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5664">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5665">un espace (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5665">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5666">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5666">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5667">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5668">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5668">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5669">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5670">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5670">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5671">L’expression régulière  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5671">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5672">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5672">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5688">Numéro de carte d’identité Malte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5688">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5689">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5690">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5691">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5692">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5693">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5694">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5696">sept chiffres suivis d’une lettre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5696">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5697">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5698">sept chiffres suivis d’une lettre :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5698">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5699">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5699">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5700">une lettre dans « M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z » (ne respecte pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5700">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5701">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5702">Non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5702">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5703">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5704">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5704">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5705">L’expression régulière  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5705">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5706">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5706">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5707">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5707">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5708">L’expression régulière  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5708">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5725">Numéro de passeport de Malte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5725">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5726">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5726">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5727">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5728">sept chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5728">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5729">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5730">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5730">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5731">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5732">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5732">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5733">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5734">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5734">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5735">L’expression régulière  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5735">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5736">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5736">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5753">Numéro d’identification fiscale Malte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5753">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5754">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5755">Pour les ressortissants maltais :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5755">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5756">sept chiffres et une lettre dans le modèle spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5756">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5757">Ressortissants non maltaises et entités maltaises :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5757">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5758">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5758">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5759">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5760">Ressortissants maltaises : sept chiffres et une lettre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5760">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5761">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5761">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5762">une lettre (ne respecte pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5762">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5763">Ressortissants non maltaises et entités maltaises : neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5763">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5764">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5764">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5765">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5766">Non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5766">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5767">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5768">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5768">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5769">L’expression régulière  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  ou `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5769">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5770">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5770">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5771">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5771">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5772">L’expression régulière  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` ou `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5772">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5805">Numéro de service du citoyen néerlandais (BSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5805">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5806">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5807">huit à neuf chiffres contenant des espaces facultatifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5807">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5808">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5809">huit chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5809">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5810">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5810">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5811">un espace (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5811">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5812">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5812">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5813">un espace (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5813">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5814">deux à trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5814">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5815">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5816">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5816">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5817">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5818">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5818">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5819">La fonction Func_netherlands_bsn trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5819">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5820">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_netherlands_bsn est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5820">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5821">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5821">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5845">Numéro de permis de conduire néerlandais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5845">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5846">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5846">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5847">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5847">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5848">dix chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5848">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5849">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5850">dix chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5850">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5851">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5852">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5852">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5853">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5854">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5854">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5855">L’expression régulière  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5855">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5856">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5856">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5874">Numéro de passeport néerlandais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5874">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5875">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5875">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5876">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5876">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5877">neuf lettres ou chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5877">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5878">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5878">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5879">neuf lettres ou chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5879">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5880">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5881">non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5881">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5882">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5883">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5883">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5884">L’expression régulière  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5884">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5885">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5885">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5895">Numéro d’identification fiscale néerlandaise</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5895">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5896">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5896">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5897">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5897">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5898">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5898">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5899">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5899">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5900">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5900">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5901">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5901">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5902">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5903">neuf chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5903">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5904">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5905">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5905">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5906">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5907">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5907">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5908">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5909">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5909">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5910">La fonction  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5910">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5911">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5911">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5912">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5912">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5913">La fonction  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5913">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">

        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5952">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5952">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5953">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5953">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5954">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5954">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5955">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5955">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5956">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5956">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5957">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5957">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5958">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5959">modèle alphanumérique de 14 caractères</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5959">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5960">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5961">modèle alphanumérique de 14 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5961">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5962">N ou n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5962">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5963">L ou l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5963">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5964">espace, point ou tiret facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5964">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5965">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5965">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5966">espace, point ou tiret facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5966">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5967">B ou b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5967">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5968">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5968">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5969">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5970">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5970">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-5971">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5971">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5972">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5972">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5973">La fonction Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5973">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5974">Un mot clé depuis Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5974">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-5975">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5975">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-5976">La fonction Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-5976">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6011">La fonction Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6011">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6027">modèle alphanumérique à huit caractères</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6027">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6028">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6028">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6029">modèle alphanumérique à huit caractères</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6029">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6030">deux lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6030">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6031">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6031">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6032">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6032">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6033">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6033">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6034">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6034">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6035">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6035">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6036">La fonction Func_newzealand_driver_license_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6036">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6037">Un mot clé depuis Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6037">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6038">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6038">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6039">La fonction Func_newzealand_driver_license_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6039">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6106">Numéro de revenu intérieur Nouvelle-Zélande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6106">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6107">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6107">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6108">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6108">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6109">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6109">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6110">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6110">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6111">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6111">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6112">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6112">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6113">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6114">huit ou neuf chiffres avec des délimiteurs facultatifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6114">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6115">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6116">huit ou neuf chiffres avec des délimiteurs facultatifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6116">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6117">deux ou trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6117">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6118">un espace ou un tiret facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6118">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6119">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6119">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6120">un espace ou un tiret facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6120">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6121">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6121">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6122">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6123">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6123">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6124">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6125">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6125">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6126">La fonction Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6126">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6127">Un mot clé depuis Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6127">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6128">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6128">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6129">La fonction Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6129">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6138">Ministère de l’assurance Nouvelle-Zélande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6138">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6139">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6140">trois lettres, un espace (facultatif) et quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6140">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6141">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6142">trois lettres (ne respectant pas la casse) un espace (facultatif) quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6142">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6143">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6143">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6144">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6144">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6145">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6145">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6146">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6146">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6147">La fonction Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6147">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6148">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_nz_terms est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6148">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6149">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6149">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
