## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6156">Numéro de wlefare sociale Nouvelle-Zélande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6156">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6157">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6157">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6158">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6158">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6159">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6159">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6160">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6160">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6161">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6161">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6162">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6162">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6163">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6164">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6164">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6165">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6166">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6166">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6167">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6167">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6168">un trait d’union conditionnel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6168">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6169">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6169">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6170">un trait d’union conditionnel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6170">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6171">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6171">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6172">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6173">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6173">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6174">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6175">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6175">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6176">La fonction Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6176">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6177">Un mot clé depuis Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6177">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6178">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6178">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6179">La fonction Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6179">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6187">Numéro d’identification de la Norvège</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6187">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6188">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6189">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6189">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6190">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6191">11 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6191">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6192">six chiffres au format JJMMAA qui correspondent à la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6192">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6193">Numéro individuel à trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6193">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6194">deux chiffres de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6194">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6195">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6196">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6196">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6197">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6198">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6198">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6199">La fonction Func_norway_id_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6199">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6200">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_norway_id_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6200">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6201">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6201">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6202">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6202">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6203">La fonction Func_norway_id_numbe trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6203">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6204">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6204">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6213">Numéro d’identification unifiée à usage unique pour les Philippines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6213">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6214">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6215">12 chiffres séparés par des traits d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6215">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6216">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6217">12 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6217">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6218">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6218">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6219">un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6219">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6220">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6220">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6221">un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6221">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6222">un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6222">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6223">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6223">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6224">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6224">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6225">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6225">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6226">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6226">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6227">L’expression régulière Regex_philippines_unified_id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6227">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6228">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_philippines_id est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6228">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6235">Numéro de permis de conduire polonais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6235">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6236">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6236">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6237">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6238">14 chiffres contenant 2 barres obliques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6238">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6239">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6240">14 chiffres et 2 barres obliques :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6240">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6241">cinq chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6241">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6242">une barre oblique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6242">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6243">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6243">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6244">une barre oblique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6244">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6245">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6245">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6246">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6247">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6247">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6248">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6249">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6268">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6269">trois lettres et six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6269">three letters and six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6275">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6277">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6277">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6278">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6278">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">

          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6289">ID national Pologne (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6289">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6292">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6292">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6293">6 chiffres représentant la date de naissance au format AAMMJJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6293">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6295">1 chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6295">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6296">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6296">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6298">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6299">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6299">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6300">La fonction Func_pesel_identification_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6300">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6301">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_pesel_identification_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6301">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6302">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6302">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6303">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6303">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6304">La fonction Func_pesel_identification_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6304">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6305">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6305">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />

        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6317">Numéro de passeport polonais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6317">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6318">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6318">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6321">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6321">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6322">Deux lettres (ne respectant pas la casse) suivies de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6322">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6323">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6324">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6324">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6325">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6326">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6326">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6327">La fonction Func_polish_passport_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6327">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6328">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6328">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6329">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6329">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6346">nombre à neuf chiffres ou 14 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6346">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6354">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6354">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6357">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6357">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6358">La fonction Func_polish_regon_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6358">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">

          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6375">Numéro d’identification de taxe polonais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6375">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6376">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6376">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6377">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6377">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6378">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6378">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6379">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6379">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6380">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6380">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6381">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6381">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6382">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6382">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6383">11 chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6383">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6384">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6384">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6385">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6385">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6386">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6387">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6387">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6388">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6389">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6389">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6390">La fonction  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6390">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6391">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6391">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6421">Numéro de carte de citoyen Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6421">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6422">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6422">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6423">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6423">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6424">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6424">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6425">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6425">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6426">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6426">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6427">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6427">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6428">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6428">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6429">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6429">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6430">L’expression régulière Regex_portugal_citizen_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6430">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6431">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_portugal_citizen_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6431">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6451">Numéro de permis de conduire du fabricant Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6451">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6452">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6452">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6453">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6453">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6454">deux lettres suivies d’un nombre de sept chiffres dans le modèle spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6454">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6455">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6455">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6456">deux lettres suivies de sept chiffres avec des caractères spéciaux :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6456">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6457">deux lettres (ne respectent pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6457">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6458">un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6458">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6459">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6459">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6460">un espace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6460">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6461">un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6461">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6462">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6462">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6463">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6463">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6464">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6464">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6465">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6465">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6466">L’expression régulière  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6466">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6467">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6467">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6483">Numéro de passeport Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6483">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6484">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6484">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6485">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6486">une lettre suivie de six chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6486">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6487">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6488">une lettre suivie de six chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6488">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6489">une lettre (ne respecte pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6489">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6490">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6490">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6491">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6492">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6492">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6493">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6494">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6494">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6495">L’expression régulière  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6495">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6496">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6496">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6520">Numéro d’identification fiscale du Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6520">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6521">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6521">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6522">neuf chiffres avec des espaces facultatifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6522">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6523">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6523">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6524">3 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6524">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6525">un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6525">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6526">3 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6526">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6527">un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6527">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6528">3 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6528">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6529">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6530">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6530">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6531">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6532">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6532">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6533">La fonction  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6533">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6534">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6534">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6535">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6535">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6536">La fonction  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6536">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6561">Numéro de permis de conduire roumain</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6561">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6572">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6590">Code numérique de la Roumanie (CNP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6590">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6591">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6591">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6592">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6592">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6593">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6593">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6594">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6594">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6595">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6595">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6596">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6596">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6597">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6598">13 chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6598">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6599">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6599">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6600">1 chiffre de 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6600">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6601">6 chiffres représentant la date de naissance (AAMMJJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6601">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6602">2 chiffres qui peuvent être 01-52 ou 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6602">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6603">4 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6603">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6604">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6604">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6605">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6605">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6606">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6606">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6607">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6607">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6608">La fonction  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6608">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6609">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6609">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6610">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6610">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6611">La fonction  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6611">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6662">Numéro de passeport roumain</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6662">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6663">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6663">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6664">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6665">huit ou neuf chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6665">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6666">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6667">huit ou neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6667">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6668">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6669">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6669">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6670">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6671">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6671">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6672">L’expression régulière  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6672">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6673">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6689">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6690">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6697">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6697">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6701">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6701">two digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6703">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6703">six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6705">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6705">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6707">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6707">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6708">L’expression Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6708">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6762">ID national Arabie saoudite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6762">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6763">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6764">dix chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6764">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6765">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6766">dix chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6766">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6767">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6768">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6768">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6769">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6770">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6770">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6771">L’expression régulière Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6771">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6772">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6772">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6779">Numéro de carte d’identité d’enregistrement national (NRIC) Singapour</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6779">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6781">neuf lettres et chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6781">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6782">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6782">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6783">neuf lettres et chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6783">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6784">la lettre « F », « G », « S » ou « T » (ne respecte pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6784">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6785">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6785">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6786">un chiffre de contrôle alphabétique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6786">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6787">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6788">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6789">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6790">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6791">L’expression régulière Regex_singapore_nric trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6791">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6792">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_singapore_nric est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6792">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6793">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6793">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6794">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6794">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6795">L’expression régulière Regex_singapore_nric trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6795">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6796">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6807">Numéro de permis de conduire Slovaquie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6807">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6808">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6808">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6809">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6809">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6810">un caractère suivi de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6810">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6811">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6812">un caractère suivi de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6812">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6813">une lettre (ne respecte pas la casse) ou un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6813">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6814">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6814">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6815">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6816">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6816">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6817">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6818">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6818">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6819">L’expression régulière  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6819">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6820">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6820">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6836">Numéro personnel de Slovaquie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6836">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6837">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6837">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6838">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6838">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6839">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6839">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6840">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6840">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6841">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6841">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6842">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6842">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6843">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6843">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6844">neuf ou dix chiffres contenant une barre oblique inverse facultative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6844">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6845">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6845">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6846">6 chiffres représentant la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6846">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6847">barre oblique (/) facultative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6847">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6848">3 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6848">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6849">1 chiffre de contrôle facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6849">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6850">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6851">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6851">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6852">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6853">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6853">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6854">La fonction  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6854">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6855">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6855">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6856">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6856">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6857">La fonction  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6857">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6904">Numéro de passeport slovaque</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6904">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6905">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6905">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6906">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6907">un chiffre ou une lettre suivi de sept chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6907">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6908">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6908">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6909">un chiffre ou une lettre (ne respectant pas la casse) suivi de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6909">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6910">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6911">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6911">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6912">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6913">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6913">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6914">L’expression régulière  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6914">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6915">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6915">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6934">Numéro de permis de conduire Slovénie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6934">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6935">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6935">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6936">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6936">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6937">neuf chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6937">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6938">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6938">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6939">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6939">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6940">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6941">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6941">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6942">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6943">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6944">L’expression régulière  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6944">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6945">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6945">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6961">Numéro de citoyen principal unique Slovénie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6961">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6962">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6962">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6963">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6963">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6964">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6964">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6965">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6965">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6966">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6966">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6967">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6967">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6968">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6968">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6969">13 chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6969">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6970">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6970">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6971">13 chiffres dans le modèle spécifié :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6971">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6972">sept chiffres correspondant à la date de naissance (DDMMLLL) où « LLL » correspond aux trois derniers chiffres de l’année de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6972">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6973">deux chiffres correspondant à la zone de naissance « 50 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6973">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6974">trois chiffres correspondant à une combinaison de sexe et de numéro de série pour les personnes nées le même jour (000-499 pour les mâles et les 500-999 pour les femelles)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6974">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6975">un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6975">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6976">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6976">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6977">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6977">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-6978">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6978">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6979">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6979">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6980">La fonction  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6980">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6981">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6981">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-6982">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6982">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-6983">La fonction  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-6983">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
