## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7011">Numéro de passeport Slovénie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7011">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7012">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7012">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7013">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7014">deux lettres suivies de sept chiffres, sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7014">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7015">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7016">deux lettres suivies de sept chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7016">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7017">la lettre « P »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7017">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7018">une lettre majuscule</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7018">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7019">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7019">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7020">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7020">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7021">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7021">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7022">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7022">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7023">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7023">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7024">L’expression régulière  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7024">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7025">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7025">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7045">Numéro d’identification fiscale de la Slovénie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7045">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7046">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7046">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7047">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7047">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7048">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7048">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7049">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7049">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7050">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7050">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7051">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7051">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7052">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7052">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7053">huit chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7053">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7054">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7054">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7055">un chiffre de 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7055">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7056">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7056">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7057">un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7057">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7058">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7059">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7059">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7060">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7061">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7061">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7062">La fonction  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7062">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7063">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7063">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7064">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7064">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7065">La fonction  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7065">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7089">Numéro d’identification Afrique du Sud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7089">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7090">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7091">13 chiffres pouvant contenir des espaces</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7091">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7092">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7093">13 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7093">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7094">six chiffres au format AAMMJJ correspondant à la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7094">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7095">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7095">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7096">indicateur de citoyenneté à un seul chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7096">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7097">le chiffre « 8 » ou « 9 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7097">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7098">un chiffre qui est un chiffre de la somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7098">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7099">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7099">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7100">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7100">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7101">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7101">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7102">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7102">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7103">La fonction Func_south_africa_identification_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7103">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7104">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_south_africa_identification_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7104">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7105">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7105">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7111">Numéro d’enregistrement résident Corée du Sud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7111">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7112">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7112">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7113">13 chiffres contenant un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7113">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7114">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7114">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7115">13 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7115">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7116">six chiffres au format AAMMJJ correspondant à la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7116">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7117">un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7117">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7118">un chiffre déterminé par le siècle et le sexe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7118">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7119">Code de région de naissance à quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7119">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7120">un chiffre utilisé pour différencier les personnes dont les numéros précédents sont identiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7120">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7121">un chiffre de contrôle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7121">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7122">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7123">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7123">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7124">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7125">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7125">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7126">La fonction Func_south_korea_resident_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7126">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7127">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_south_korea_resident_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7127">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7128">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7128">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7129">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7129">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7130">La fonction Func_south_korea_resident_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7130">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7131">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7131">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7139">Numéro de permis de conduire Espagne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7139">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7140">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7140">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7141">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7141">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7142">huit chiffres suivis d’un caractère</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7142">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7143">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7143">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7144">huit chiffres suivis d’un caractère :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7144">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7145">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7145">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7146">un chiffre ou une lettre (ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7146">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7147">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7148">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7148">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7149">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7150">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7150">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7151">La fonction  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7151">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7152">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7152">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7189">Espagne DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7189">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7190">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7190">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7191">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7191">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7192">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7192">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7193">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7193">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7194">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7194">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7195">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7195">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7196">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7196">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7197">huit chiffres suivis d’un caractère</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7197">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7198">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7199">sept chiffres suivis d’un caractère</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7199">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7200">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7200">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7201">Un espace ou un tiret facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7201">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7202">une lettre de vérification (ne respecte pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7202">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7203">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7204">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7204">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7205">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7206">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7206">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7207">La fonction  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` ou `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7207">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7208">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7208">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7209">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7209">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7210">La fonction  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` ou `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7210">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7234">Numéro de passeport Espagne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7234">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7235">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7235">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7236">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7236">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7237">combinaison de huit ou neuf caractères de lettres et de chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7237">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7238">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7238">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7239">combinaison de huit ou neuf caractères de lettres et de chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7239">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7240">deux chiffres ou lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7240">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7241">un chiffre ou une lettre (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7241">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7242">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7242">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7243">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7244">Non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7244">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7245">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7246">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7246">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7247">L’expression régulière  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7247">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7248">Un mot clé depuis  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` ou `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7248">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7274">Numéro de sécurité sociale (SSN) Espagne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7274">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7275">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de sécurité sociale de l’UE ou d’un ID équivalent et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7275">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7276">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7276">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7277">11 à 12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7277">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7278">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7278">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7279">11-12 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7279">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7280">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7280">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7281">une barre oblique (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7281">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7282">sept à huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7282">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7283">une barre oblique (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7283">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7284">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7284">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7285">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7285">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7286">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7286">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7287">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7287">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7288">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7288">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7289">La fonction Func_spanish_social_security_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7289">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7290">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7290">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7291">Mots clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7291">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7292">Aucun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7292">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7293">Numéro d’identification fiscale Espagne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7293">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7294">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7294">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7295">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7295">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7296">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7296">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7297">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7297">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7298">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7298">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7299">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7299">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7300">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7300">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7301">sept ou huit chiffres et une ou deux lettres dans le modèle spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7301">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7302">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7302">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7303">Personnes physiques espagnoles avec une carte d’identité nationale d’Espagne :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7303">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7304">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7304">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7305">une lettre majuscule (respecte la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7305">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7306">Spaniards non résident sans carte d’identité nationale d’Espagne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7306">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7307">une lettre majuscule « L » (respecte la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7307">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7308">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7308">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7309">une lettre majuscule (respecte la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7309">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7310">Spaniards résident de moins de 14 ans sans carte d’identité nationale (Espagne) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7310">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7311">une lettre majuscule « K » (respecte la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7311">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7312">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7312">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7313">une lettre majuscule (respecte la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7313">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7314">Foreigners avec le numéro d’identification d’un étranger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7314">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7315">une lettre majuscule qui est « X », « Y » ou « Z » (respecte la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7315">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7316">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7316">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7317">une lettre majuscule (respecte la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7317">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7318">Foreigners sans numéro d’identification étranger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7318">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7319">une lettre majuscule qui est « M » (respecte la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7319">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7320">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7320">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7321">une lettre majuscule (respecte la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7321">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7322">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7323">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7323">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7324">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7325">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7325">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7326">La fonction  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` ou `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7326">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7327">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7327">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7328">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7328">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7329">La fonction  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` ou `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7329">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7330">Mots clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7330">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7331">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7331">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7332">importation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7332">cif</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7333">cifid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7333">cifid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7334">cifnúmero #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7334">cifnúmero#</span></span>

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7360">Chaîne de connexion SQL Server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7360">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7361">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7361">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7362">La chaîne « User ID », « User ID », « UID » ou « UserId » suivi des caractères et des chaînes décrits dans le modèle ci-dessous.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7362">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7363">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7363">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7364">la chaîne « User ID », « User ID », « UID » ou « UserId »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7364">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7365">n’importe quelle combinaison entre 1-200 majuscules ou minuscules, des chiffres, des symboles, des caractères spéciaux ou des espaces</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7365">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7366">la chaîne "password" ou "PWD" où "PWD" n’est pas précédé d’une lettre minuscule</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7366">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7367">signe égal (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7367">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7368">tout caractère qui n’est pas un signe dollar ($), un symbole de pourcentage (%), un symbole supérieur à (>), un symbole (@), un guillemet ("), un point-virgule (;), une accolade ouvrante ([) ou un crochet gauche ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7368">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7369">n’importe quelle combinaison de 7-128 caractères qui ne sont pas des points-virgules (;), barre oblique (/) ou guillemets (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7369">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7370">un point-virgule (;) ou guillemets (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7370">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7371">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7372">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7372">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7373">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7374">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7374">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7375">L’expression régulière CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7375">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7376">Un mot clé depuis CEP_GlobalFilter **est introuvable** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7376">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7377">L’expression régulière CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder ne trouve **pas** le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7377">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7378">L’expression régulière CEP_CommonExampleKeywords ne trouve **pas** le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7378">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7379">Mots clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7379">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7380">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7380">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7381">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7381">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7382">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7382">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7383">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7383">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7384">échantillonnage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7384">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7385">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7385">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7386">(Notez que techniquement, ce type d’informations sensibles identifie ces mots clés à l’aide d’une expression régulière, et non d’une liste de mots clés.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7386">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7387">Mot de passe ou mot de passe suivi par 0-2 espaces, un signe égal (=), 0-2 espaces et un astérisque (\*)--ou--</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7387">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7388">Mot de passe ou mot de passe suivi par :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7388">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7389">Signe égal (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7389">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7390">Symbole inférieur à (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7390">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7391">Toute combinaison de 1-200 caractères qui sont des lettres majuscules ou minuscules, des chiffres, un astérisque (\*), un tiret (-), un trait de soulignement (_) ou un espace blanc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7391">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7392">Symbole supérieur à (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7392">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7393">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7393">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7394">(Notez que techniquement, ce type d’informations sensibles identifie ces mots clés à l’aide d’une expression régulière, et non d’une liste de mots clés.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7394">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7406">Numéro de permis de conduire Suède</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7406">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7407">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7407">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7408">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7409">dix chiffres contenant un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7409">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7410">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7411">dix chiffres contenant un trait d’Union :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7411">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7412">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7412">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7413">un trait d’Union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7413">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7414">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7414">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7415">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7416">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7416">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7417">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7418">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7418">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7419">L’expression régulière  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7419">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7420">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7420">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7436">ID national de Suède</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7436">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7437">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7438">10 ou 12 chiffres et un délimiteur facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7438">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7439">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7440">10 ou 12 chiffres et un délimiteur facultatif :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7440">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7441">deux chiffres (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7441">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7442">Six chiffres au format de date AAMMJJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7442">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7443">délimiteur « - » ou « + » (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7443">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7444">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7444">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7445">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7446">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7446">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7447">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7448">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7448">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7449">La fonction `Func_swedish_national_identifier` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7449">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7450">Un mot clé from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` est trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7450">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7451">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7451">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7452">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7452">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7453">La fonction `Func_swedish_national_identifier` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7453">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7454">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7454">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7473">Numéro de passeport Suède</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7473">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7474">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro de passeport de l’UE et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7474">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7476">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7476">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7477">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7478">huit chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7478">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7479">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7480">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7480">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7481">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7482">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7482">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7483">l’expression régulière Regex_sweden_passport_number trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7483">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7484">l’une des conditions suivantes est vraie :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7484">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7485">un mot clé depuis Keyword_passport est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7485">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7486">un mot clé depuis Keyword_sweden_passport est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7486">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7517">Numéro de sécurité sociale de la Suède ou identification équivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7517">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7518">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible dans le type d’information de numéro de sécurité sociale ou d’ID équivalent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7518">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7519">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7519">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7520">12 chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7520">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7521">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7521">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7522">12 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7522">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7523">huit chiffres correspondant à la date de naissance (AAAAMMJJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7523">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7524">trois chiffres correspondant à un numéro de série où :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7524">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7525">le dernier chiffre du numéro de série indique sexe par l’affectation d’un nombre impair pour le mâle et d’un nombre pair pour femelle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7525">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7526">jusqu’à 1990, l’affectation du numéro de série correspond au comté où le porteur du numéro est né ou (en naissance avant 1947) où il a été vivant, en fonction des enregistrements fiscaux, le 1er janvier 1947, avec un code spécial (généralement 9 comme le 7 chiffres) pour immigrants</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7526">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7527">un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7527">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7528">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7528">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7529">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7529">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7530">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7530">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7531">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7531">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7532">La fonction  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7532">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7533">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7533">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7534">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7534">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7535">La fonction  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7535">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7551">Numéro d’identification de taxe Suède</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7551">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7552">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7552">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7553">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7553">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7554">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7554">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7555">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7555">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7556">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7556">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7557">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7557">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7558">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7558">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7559">dix chiffres et un symbole dans le modèle spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7559">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7560">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7560">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7561">dix chiffres et un symbole :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7561">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7562">six chiffres correspondant à la date de naissance (AAMMJJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7562">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7563">un signe plus ou un signe moins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7563">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7564">trois chiffres qui permettent de définir le numéro d’identification unique :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7564">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7565">pour les numéros émis avant le 1990, le septième et le huitième chiffre identifient le comté de naissance ou les personnes nées à l’étranger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7565">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7566">le chiffre de la neuvième position indique le sexe soit impair, soit pair pour femme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7566">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7567">un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7567">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7568">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7569">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7569">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7570">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7571">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7571">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7572">La fonction  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7572">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7573">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7573">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7574">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7574">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7575">La fonction  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7575">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7601">Code SWIFT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7601">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7602">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7602">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7603">quatre lettres suivies de 5-31 lettres ou chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7603">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7604">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7604">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7605">quatre lettres suivies de 5-31 lettres ou chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7605">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7606">Code de la Banque à quatre lettres (ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7606">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7607">un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7607">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7608">4 à 28 lettres ou chiffres (numéro de compte bancaire de base (BBAN))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7608">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7609">un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7609">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7610">une à trois lettres ou chiffres (reste de la BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7610">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7611">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7611">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7612">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7612">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7613">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7613">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7614">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7614">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7615">L’expression régulière Regex_swift trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7615">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7616">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_swift est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7616">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
