## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7650">Suisse numéro AVS AVS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7650">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7651">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7651">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7652">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7652">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7653">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7653">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7654">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7654">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7655">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7655">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7656">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7656">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7657">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7658">numéro à 13 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7658">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7659">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7660">numéro à 13 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7660">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7661">trois chiffres-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7661">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7662">point facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7662">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7663">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7663">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7664">point facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7664">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7665">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7665">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7666">point facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7666">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7667">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7667">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7668">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7669">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7669">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7670">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7671">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7671">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7672">La fonction Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7672">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7673">Un mot clé depuis Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7673">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7674">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7674">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7675">La fonction Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7675">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7696">Numéro d’identification national taïwanais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7696">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7697">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7698">une lettre suivie de neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7698">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7699">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7700">une lettre suivie de neuf chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7700">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7701">une lettre (en anglais, ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7701">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7702">le chiffre « 1 » ou « 2 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7702">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7703">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7703">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7704">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7705">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7705">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7706">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7707">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7707">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7708">La fonction Func_taiwanese_national_id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7708">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7709">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_taiwanese_national_id est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7709">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7710">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7710">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7711">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7711">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7712">La fonction Func_taiwanese_national_id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7712">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7713">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7713">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7730">Numéro de passeport taïwanais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7730">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7731">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7731">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7732">Numéro de passeport biométrique : neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7732">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7733">Numéro de passeport non biométrique : neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7733">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7734">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7734">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7735">Numéro de passeport biométrique :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7735">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7736">le caractère « 3 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7736">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7737">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7737">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7738">Numéro de passeport non biométrique :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7738">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7739">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7739">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7740">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7740">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7741">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7741">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7742">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7742">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7743">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7743">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7744">L’expression régulière Regex_taiwan_passport trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7744">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7745">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_taiwan_passport est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7745">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7756">Numéro de certificat résident taïwanais (ARC/TARC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7756">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7757">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7758">10 lettres et chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7758">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7759">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7760">10 lettres et chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7760">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7761">deux lettres (ne respectant pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7761">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7762">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7762">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7763">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7764">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7764">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7765">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7766">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7766">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7767">L’expression régulière Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7767">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7768">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7768">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7769">Mots clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7769">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7770">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7770">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7771">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7771">Resident Certificate</span></span>

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7782">Code d’identification du remplissage thaï</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7782">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7783">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7783">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7784">13 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7784">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7785">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7785">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7786">13 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7786">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7787">le premier chiffre est différent de zéro ou neuf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7787">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7788">12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7788">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7789">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7790">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7790">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7791">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7792">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7793">La fonction Func_Thai_Citizen_Id trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7793">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7794">Un mot clé depuis Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7794">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7795">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7795">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7796">La fonction Func_Thai_Citizen_Id trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7796">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7805">Numéro d’identification national turc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7805">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7806">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7807">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7807">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7808">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7809">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7809">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7810">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7811">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7811">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7812">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7813">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7813">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7814">La fonction Func_Turkish_National_Id trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7814">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7815">Un mot clé depuis Keyword_Turkish_National_Id est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7815">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7816">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7816">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7817">La fonction Func_Turkish_National_Id trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7817">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7824">impérial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7824">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7825">Numéro de permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7825">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7826">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le type d’informations sensibles du pilote de l’UE et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7826">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7827">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7827">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7828">Combinaison de 18 lettres et chiffres au format spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7828">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7829">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7829">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7830">18 lettres et chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7830">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7831">cinq lettres (ne respectant pas la casse) ou le chiffre « 9 » à la place d’une lettre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7831">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7832">un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7832">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7833">cinq chiffres au format de date MMDDY pour la date de naissance (7 caractères sont incrémentés de 50 si le pilote est femelle, c’est-à-dire 51 vers 62 au lieu de 01 à 12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7833">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7834">deux lettres (ne respectant pas la casse) ou le chiffre « 9 » à la place d’une lettre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7834">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7835">cinq chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7835">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7836">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7837">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7837">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7838">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7839">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7839">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7840">La fonction Func_uk_drivers_license trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7840">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7841">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_uk_drivers_license est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7841">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7842">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7842">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7860">impérial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7860">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7861">Numéro de la déroulation électorale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7861">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7862">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7863">deux lettres suivies de 1-4 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7863">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7864">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7865">deux lettres (ne respectant pas la casse) suivies de numéros 1-4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7865">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7866">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7867">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7867">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7868">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7869">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7869">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7870">L’expression régulière Regex_uk_electoral trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7870">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7871">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_uk_electoral est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7871">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7878">impérial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7878">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7879">Numéro de service de santé national</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7879">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7881">10 à 17 chiffres séparés par des espaces</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7881">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7882">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7883">10 à 17 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7883">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7884">trois ou dix chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7884">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7885">un espace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7885">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7886">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7886">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7887">un espace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7887">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7888">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7888">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7889">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7889">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7890">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7890">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7891">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7891">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7892">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7892">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7893">La fonction Func_uk_nhs_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7893">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7894">L’une des affirmations suivantes est vraie :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7894">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7895">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_uk_nhs_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7895">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7896">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7896">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7897">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7897">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7898">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7898">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7904">administration de la santé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7904">health authority</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7916">impérial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7916">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7917">Numéro d’assurance nationale (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7917">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7918">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le type d’informations sensibles du numéro identificaiton national UE et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7918">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7919">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7919">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7920">sept caractères ou neuf caractères séparés par des espaces ou des tirets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7920">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7921">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7921">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7922">deux modèles possibles :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7922">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7923">deux lettres (valides NINOs Utilisez uniquement certains caractères dans ce préfixe, que ce modèle valide ; ne respecte pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7923">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7924">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7924">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7925">« A », « B », « C » ou « d » (comme le préfixe, seuls certains caractères sont autorisés dans le suffixe ; ne respectent pas la casse)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7925">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7926">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7926">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7927">deux lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7927">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7928">un espace ou un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7928">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7929">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7929">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7930">un espace ou un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7930">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7931">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7931">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7932">un espace ou un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7932">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7933">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7933">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7934">un espace ou un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7934">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7935">« A », « B », « C » ou « d »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7935">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7936">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7937">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7937">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7938">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7939">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7939">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7940">La fonction Func_uk_nino trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7940">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7941">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_uk_nino est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7941">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7942">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7942">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7943">La fonction Func_uk_nino trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7943">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7944">Aucun mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_uk_nino n’est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7944">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7966">impérial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7966">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7967">Numéro de référence unique du contribuable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7967">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7968">Ce type d’informations sensibles est disponible uniquement dans les cas suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7968">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7969">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7969">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7970">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7970">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7971">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7971">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7972">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7972">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7973">Sécurité des applications Cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7973">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7974">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7975">10 chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7975">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7976">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7976">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7977">10 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7977">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7978">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7979">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7979">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7980">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-7981">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7981">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7982">La fonction  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` trouve le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7982">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7983">Un mot clé from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7983">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7984">Mots clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7984">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-7985">Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7985">Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7986">Numéro de taxe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7986">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-7987">fichier taxe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-7987">tax file</span></span>

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8003">Numéro de compte bancaire américain</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8003">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8004">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8005">8-17 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8005">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8006">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8006">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8007">8 à 17 chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8007">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8008">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8009">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8009">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8010">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8011">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8012">L’expression régulière Regex_usa_bank_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8012">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8013">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_usa_Bank_Account est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8013">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8043">Numéro de permis de conduire américain</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8043">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8044">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8045">Dépend de l’État</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8045">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8046">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8047">dépend de l’État (par exemple, New York) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8047">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8048">neuf chiffres au format DDD DDD DDD correspondront.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8048">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8049">neuf chiffres comme ddddddddd ne correspondent pas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8049">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8050">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8050">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8051">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8051">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8052">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8052">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8053">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8053">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8054">La fonction Func_new_york_drivers_license_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8054">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8055">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8055">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8056">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_us_drivers_license est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8056">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8057">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8057">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8058">La fonction Func_new_york_drivers_license_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8058">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8059">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8059">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8060">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8060">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8061">Aucun mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_us_drivers_license n’est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8061">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8159">Numéro d’identification du contribuable américain (ITIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8159">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8160">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8160">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8161">neuf chiffres commençant par le « 9 » et contenant un « 7 » ou un « 8 » en tant que quatrième chiffre, éventuellement mis en forme avec des espaces ou des tirets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8161">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8162">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8162">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8163">avec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8163">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8164">le chiffre « 9 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8164">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8165">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8165">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8166">un espace ou un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8166">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8167">« 7 » ou « 8 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8167">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8168">un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8168">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8169">un espace ou un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8169">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8170">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8170">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8171">non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8171">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8172">le chiffre « 9 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8172">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8173">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8173">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8174">« 7 » ou « 8 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8174">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8175">cinq chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8175">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8176">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8176">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8177">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8177">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8178">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8178">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8179">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8179">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8180">La fonction Func_formatted_itin trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8180">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8181">Au moins une des affirmations suivantes est vraie :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8181">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8182">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_itin est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8182">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8183">La fonction Func_us_address trouve une adresse au format correct.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8183">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8184">La fonction Func_us_date trouve une date au format correct.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8184">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8185">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_itin_collaborative est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8185">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8186">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8186">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8187">La fonction Func_unformatted_itin trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8187">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8188">Au moins une des affirmations suivantes est vraie :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8188">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8189">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_itin_collaborative est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8189">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8190">La fonction Func_us_address trouve une adresse au format correct.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8190">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8191">La fonction Func_us_date trouve une date au format correct.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8191">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8212">Numéro de sécurité sociale américain (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8212">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8213">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8213">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8214">neuf chiffres, qui peuvent être mis en forme ou non mis en forme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8214">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8215">La mise en forme d’un numéro de sécurité sociale émis avant le milieu de l’année 2011 est fixe et certaines parties du numéro doivent se situer dans certaines plages pour qu’il soit valide (mais il n’y a pas de somme de contrôle).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8215">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8216">Modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8217">quatre fonctions recherchent numéros dans quatre modèles différents :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8217">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8218">Func_ssn recherche des numéros de sécurité sociale avec une mise en forme fixe d’avant l’année 2011, mis en forme avec des tirets ou des espaces (ddd-dd-dddd OU ddd dd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8218">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8219">Func_unformatted_ssn recherche des numéros de sécurité sociale avec une mise en forme fixe d’avant l’année 2011, avec neuf chiffres consécutifs non mis en forme (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8219">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8220">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn recherche des numéros de sécurité sociale d’après l’année 2011, mis en forme avec des tirets ou des espaces  (ddd-dd-dddd OU ddd dd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8220">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8221">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn recherche des numéros de sécurité sociale d’après l’année 2011, avec neuf chiffres consécutifs non mis en forme (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8221">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8222">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8222">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8223">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8223">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="91b31-8224">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8224">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8225">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 85 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8225">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8226">La fonction Func_ssn trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8226">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8227">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_ssn est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8227">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8228">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 75 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8228">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8229">La fonction Func_unformatted_ssn trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8229">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8230">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_ssn est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8230">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8231">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 65 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8231">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8232">La fonction Func_randomized_formatted_ssn trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8232">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8233">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_ssn est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8233">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91b31-8234">Le pourcentage de confiance d’une stratégie DLP ayant détecté ce type d’informations sensibles est de 55 % si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8234">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8235">La fonction Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8235">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="91b31-8236">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_ssn est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91b31-8236">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

      </Entity>
